NAME: Armored Unit
NAME_ZH: 装甲部队
DESC: Armored Unit is a WonderSwan exclusive sci-fi turn-based strategy game. Main gameplay modes are story mode, trial mode, and duel mode. In the story mode the player starts by selecting an armored unit out of several available which vary in type (i.e. knight, ranger, seeker), weapons, and basic stats such as health and energy, after which one progresses through a series of stages backed up by a short dialogue cut-scenes between the stages. The basic movement occurs on a square map field where you can move your armored unit horizontally or vertically. You fight an opponent which is a hidden armored unit, visible only when you are adjacent to it or if you have a radar that can uncover it within a certain radius. Armed with weapons and special attacks based on the type of unit you have selected your goal is to defeat the enemy unit and progress to the next stage. You can fight at random map fields or use weapons of mass destruction to try and hit enemy unit without knowing where exactly it is located. After each stage, you are able to upgrade and edit your current weapon arsenal, or add new weapons and gadgets.
DESC_ZH: 《装甲部队》是一款仅在万代神奇天鹅掌机（WonderSwan）上推出的科幻回合制策略游戏。主要游戏模式包括故事模式、试炼模式和决斗模式。在故事模式中，玩家首先要从多个不同类型（如骑士、游骑兵、探索者）、配备不同武器且基础属性（如生命值和能量值）各异的装甲部队中选择一支，随后通过一系列关卡，关卡之间会穿插简短的对话过场动画。游戏的基本移动是在方形地图上进行的，玩家可以让装甲部队水平或垂直移动。玩家要对抗的敌方装甲部队处于隐藏状态，只有当你靠近它，或者你拥有能在一定半径内探测到它的雷达时，它才会显现。根据所选部队的类型，玩家可以使用武器和特殊攻击，目标是击败敌方部队并进入下一关卡。玩家可以在随机地图区域展开战斗，也可以使用大规模杀伤性武器，在不知道敌方部队确切位置的情况下尝试击中它。每通过一关，玩家都可以升级和编辑当前的武器库，或者添加新的武器和装备。

NAME: Bakusou Dekotora Densetsu
NAME_ZH: 爆走デコトラ伝説（可音译为：爆走装饰卡车传说）
DESC:
You are a young man who lives in Japan and likes driving trucks. There is a competition of truck drivers who deliver goods all across the country. Willing to impress your girlfriend Yukie, you decide to participate in the races and to win the title of the best trucker in Japan.
Dekotora is short for "decorated truck", and this racing game consists not only of driving your truck through the highway, trying to be faster than your rivals, but also of buying various stuff for your truck and decorating it. Depending on your results in the races, you can buy truck parts and customize it the way you wish.
DESC_ZH:
你是一个居住在日本、喜欢开卡车的年轻人。有一场面向全国送货卡车司机的比赛。为了给你的女友雪绘留下深刻印象，你决定参加比赛，赢得日本最佳卡车司机的称号。
“デコトラ（Dekotora）”是“装饰卡车”的简称，这款赛车游戏不仅包括驾驶你的卡车在高速公路上飞驰，试图比对手更快，还包括为你的卡车购买各种物品并进行装饰。根据你在比赛中的成绩，你可以购买卡车部件，并按照自己的意愿对其进行定制。

NAME: Beatmania
NAME_ZH: 太鼓达人（注：Beatmania一般指太鼓达人系列）
DESC:
This is a portable version of beatmania and as such it contains everything one could hope for in such a game, a series of music track (with reproduced vocals!), a lot of buttons to press, and a lot of vinyl to scratch.
After you select the music you want to play you'll have a vertical scroll which will indicate when you should hit one of the left directional buttons along with the music. The game also indicates when you should 'scratch' which should be be familiar to anyone who has played a beatmania arcade game. This refers to the scratching of a record, one might think that the WonderSwan is ill-equiped for such a for of input, well think again! beatmania for WonderSwan included in its packaging a miniature record that could be fitted over the right directional keys to  make scratching more realistic.
As you finish songs you'll on lock more difficult and interesting(?) tunes. The game plays vertically.
DESC_ZH:
这是《太鼓达人》的便携版，因此它包含了此类游戏中人们所期望的一切元素：一系列音乐曲目（还有复刻的人声！）、大量待按的按键，以及大量可模拟刮擦的黑胶唱片效果。

在你选择想要演奏的音乐后，会出现一个垂直滚动条，它会提示你何时应配合音乐按下左侧的某个方向键。游戏还会提示你何时进行“刮擦”操作，玩过《太鼓达人》街机游戏的人对这个操作应该都很熟悉。这里的“刮擦”指的是黑胶唱片的刮擦音效。你可能会认为万代的WonderSwan掌机不太适合进行这种输入操作，那就再想一想吧！《万代WonderSwan版太鼓达人》的包装内附带了一个微型唱片，它可以套在右侧方向键上，让刮擦操作更具真实感。

当你完成歌曲演奏后，就能解锁更多难度更高且有趣（？）的曲目。该游戏以纵向画面进行游玩。

NAME: Buffers Evolution
NAME_ZH: 强化进化
DESC:
In a post-apocalyptic future a gambling syndicate seeks to make a quick buck in the gritty remains of earth. By fusing the best of animal and mechanical traits they create three bestial androids from a bird, a lion, and a rhinoceros. Bets are taken and then the robots are loosed into hostile mazes of scrap metal on old earth. Maybe they'll even make it back alive...
The goal of BUFFERS EVOLUTION is to run through a course while collecting ten parts in the best time possible. The courses are large and vary between jungle scenes, deserts, old factories, and general mechanical wastes. These areas are cased in by electricity to stop the contests from escaping and thereby ruining the entertainment of the masses. This will keep you in the bounds of the course. With the press of a button your character will momentarily turn into a 'buffer', a sharp pisiform metallic object, while being a buffer you can destroy enemies by slamming into them, this will often bounce you in a given direction, which is useful for reaching high ledges. 
Although you do not need to get all the parts to clear an area special items can be accrued by collection parts, while on the course proper these parts will heal any damage you may have taken. Perhaps if you collect all the part in all nine areas you'll have the means to escape you captors? 
Gameplay is reminiscent of Sonic the Hedghog
 although in those games you race against a countdown while here you are merely trying to get good times.
DESC_ZH:
在一个后启示录的未来，一个赌博集团试图在地球的残垣断壁中快速捞一笔。他们将动物和机械的最佳特性融合在一起，从鸟类、狮子和犀牛的特征创造出了三个野兽型机器人。人们下好赌注后，这些机器人就会被放入旧地球上由废金属构成的危险迷宫中。也许它们甚至能活着回来……
《强化进化》的目标是在尽可能短的时间内跑过赛道并收集十个零件。赛道很大，场景包括丛林、沙漠、旧工厂和一般的机械废墟。这些区域被电流包围，以防止参赛者逃脱，从而破坏大众的娱乐体验。这会让你始终在赛道范围内。按下按钮，你的角色会瞬间变成一个“强化体”，一个尖锐的豌豆形金属物体，变成强化体时，你可以通过撞击来摧毁敌人，这通常会让你向某个方向反弹，这对到达高处的平台很有用。
虽然你不需要收集所有零件就能通关一个区域，但通过收集零件可以获得特殊物品，在赛道上，这些零件会治愈你可能受到的任何伤害。也许如果你在所有九个区域都收集到了所有零件，你就有办法摆脱囚禁你的人了？
游戏玩法让人想起《刺猬索尼克》，不过在那些游戏中你是与倒计时赛跑，而在这里你只是试图跑出好成绩。

NAME: Chocobo no Fushigi na Dungeon for WonderSwan
NAME_ZH: 陆行鸟不可思议的迷宫 幻想天鹅版
DESC:
This is the first game in the Chocobo's Dungeon series.  You take on the character of Chocobo and adventure through a randomly created dungeon.
The story evolves from the opening movie when a fellow chocobo is "turned" evil by a crystal he finds in a garden.  When the evil chocobo kicks you into a dungeon, the adventure begins.  Travel through an ever changing dungeon, collecting items and weapons to become more powerful, so you can defeat the increasingly difficult enemies.
DESC_ZH:
这是陆行鸟迷宫系列的首款游戏。你将扮演陆行鸟，在随机生成的迷宫中展开冒险。
故事从开场动画开始，一只陆行鸟在花园里捡到一颗水晶后“变”坏了。当这只邪恶的陆行鸟把你踢进迷宫时，冒险便拉开了帷幕。在不断变化的迷宫中穿梭，收集物品和武器以增强实力，这样你就能击败越来越强大的敌人。

NAME: Chou Aniki : Otoko no Tamafuda
NAME_ZH: 超兄贵：男人的弹珠卡
DESC:
Cho Aniki makes it's first appearance in a handheld console with Cho Aniki: Otoko no Tamafuda, only this time the game isn't a 2D shooter developed by Masaya, but instead a card-fighting RPG.
You select your character from a roster of Cho Aniki characters and set out to explore it's funky body-building universe and challenge the many npcs for a few rounds of card combat. Win and you get to increase your collection. Special cards can be unlocked by defeating another player in the vs. mode.
DESC_ZH:
《超兄贵：男人的弹珠卡》让超兄贵首次登陆掌机平台，只不过这次的游戏并非由 Masaya 开发的 2D 射击游戏，而是一款卡牌对战 RPG。
你可以从超兄贵角色列表中选择你的角色，然后出发探索这个奇特的健身世界，并与众多 NPC 进行几轮卡牌对战。获胜后，你就能增加你的卡牌收藏。在对战模式中击败其他玩家，还能解锁特殊卡牌。

NAME: Clock Tower
NAME_ZH: 钟楼
DESC:
Jennifer and her friends are adopted by a nice lady named Mary one day. They expect to be going to a wonderful new home, at the Barrows Mansion. There they will live with Mary and Mr. Barrows. Unfortunately, something goes terribly wrong and Jennifer's friends are showing up dead one by one.  While this is happening, Mary is missing and Jennifer ends up being chased by a crazed psychopath known only as...Scissorman. 
Now she must survive and get out of the mansion in this point-and-click horror adventure... Being a teenage girl, you have no special abilities at all, just your wits and your will to survive, there are a few enemies that can kill you instantly, but Scissorman is the true horror that will give you trouble.
DESC_ZH: 一天，珍妮弗和她的朋友们被一位名叫玛丽的善良女士收养。他们期待着前往位于巴罗斯庄园的美好新家。在那里，他们将与玛丽和巴罗斯先生一起生活。不幸的是，事情变得糟糕透顶，珍妮弗的朋友们一个接一个地死去。与此同时，玛丽失踪了，珍妮弗最终被一个只被称为……剪刀男的疯狂精神病患者追赶。现在，在这场点击式恐怖冒险中，她必须存活下来并逃离这座庄园……作为一个少女，你完全没有特殊能力，只有你的智慧和求生的意志。有几个敌人可以瞬间杀死你，但剪刀男才是真正会给你带来麻烦的恐怖存在。

NAME: Crazy Climber
NAME_ZH: 疯狂攀爬者
DESC:
Dans la peau de Crazy Climber, grimpez jusqu'au sommet d'une série de bâtiments, où un hélicoptère vous attend pour vous récupérer et vous emmener au bâtiment suivant. Lorsque Climber escalade un bâtiment, il est capable de monter et de se déplacer latéralement, mais il ne peut pas descendre. 
Pendant l'escalade d'un bâtiment, les fenêtres s'ouvrent et se ferment simultanément. Si une fenêtre se ferme sur l'une de ses mains, il perd sa prise. Cependant, si une fenêtre se ferme sur ses deux mains, il tombera et mourra, ce qui entraînera la perte d'une vie. Vous disposez de trois grimpeurs au total, mais un grimpeur supplémentaire vous est attribué tous les 30 000 points.
DESC_ZH:
化身为疯狂攀爬者，攀登一系列建筑物的顶端，那里有一架直升机等着接您并带您前往下一座建筑。当攀爬者攀爬建筑物时，他可以向上和横向移动，但不能向下移动。
在攀爬建筑物的过程中，窗户会同时打开和关闭。如果一扇窗户在他的一只手上关闭，他就会失去抓力。然而，如果一扇窗户在他的两只手上关闭，他就会掉落并死亡，这将导致失去一条生命。您总共拥有三名攀爬者，但每获得30000分就会额外获得一名攀爬者。

NAME: Densha de Go!
NAME_ZH: 火车GO！
DESC:
Based on the 1996 arcade game, Densha de Go! was one of the first commercial train-driving simulation games, and went on to spawn numerous successors.
The player can choose from a variety of tracks and trains and will then have to drive the train to the designated stations while sticking to the tight schedule, stopping exactly at the marked positions, obeying all signs and signals, and ensuring passenger safety and comfort.
Whenever the player makes a mistake, points are deducted from a counter which at the start of each round is initialized to a value depending on the selected difficulty. If it reaches zero, the game is over.
The following lines are featured:
1. Sagano Main Line (Sanin Line) from Kameoka to Kyoto
2. Keihin-Tohoku Line from Shinagawa to Yokohama
3. Tokaido Main Line (JR Kyoto Line) from Kyoto to Osaka
4. Yamanote Line (Inner Circle) from Shibuya to Tokyo Station
5. Tokaido Main Line EX from Takatsuki to Osaka, part of the rapid Tokaido Main Line from the original version, but this time with stops at every station (Windows only)
6. Sagano Line EX from Kameoka to Kyoto, without the shortcut from Saga-Arashiyama to Tambaguchi from the original version (Windows only)
DESC_ZH:
《火车GO！》基于1996年的街机游戏，是最早的商业火车驾驶模拟游戏之一，并衍生出了众多后续作品。
玩家可以从各种轨道和火车中进行选择，然后必须驾驶火车前往指定车站，同时要严格遵守紧凑的时刻表，精确停靠在标记位置，遵守所有标志和信号，并确保乘客的安全与舒适。
每当玩家犯错时，会从一个计数器中扣除分数，该计数器在每一轮开始时会根据所选难度初始化为一个值。如果计数器归零，游戏就结束了。
游戏中包含以下线路：
1. 从龟冈到京都的嵯峨野本线（山阴本线）
2. 从品川到横滨的京滨东北线
3. 从京都到大阪的东海道本线（JR京都线）
4. 从涩谷到东京站的山手线（内环线）
5. 从高槻到大阪的东海道本线EX，是原版快速东海道本线的一部分，但这次每站都停（仅Windows版）
6. 从龟冈到京都的嵯峨野线EX，没有原版中从嵯峨岚山到丹波口的捷径（仅Windows版）

NAME: Densha de Go! 2
NAME_ZH: 火车GO！2
DESC:
The 1998 sequel of the popular Japanese train driving game by Taito has once again been ported to various home systems. For the first time on the PlayStation, it is possible to drive through the snow, and take a seat in the cockpit of a Shinkansen bullet train.
The gameplay is more arcade than simulation. The focus is on stopping at the stations at the perfect moment and position, keeping up with the schedule, obeying signals and speed limits, and ensuring the safety and comfort of the passengers. Mistakes result in points being deducted from a counter. If it reaches 0, the game is over.
The following routes are available:
1. Hokuhoku Line from Naoetsu to Uragawara
2. Tohoku Shinkansen from Morioka to Shin-Hanamaki
3. Akita Shinkansen from Akita to Omagari
4. Keihin-Tohoku Line from Shinagawa to Ueno
5. Osaka Loop Line from Osaka to Tennoji (not in the Arcade original)
6. Kagoshima Main Line from Hakata to Kokura (only in PlayStation and Windows versions)
DESC_ZH:
这款由太东公司推出的热门日本火车驾驶游戏于1998年推出了续作，并再次被移植到了多个家用游戏平台。在 PlayStation 上，玩家首次可以驾驶火车穿越雪景，还能坐上新干线子弹头列车的驾驶舱。
游戏玩法更偏向街机风格，而非模拟。游戏重点在于在完美的时刻和位置停靠车站、按时运行、遵守信号灯和限速规定，以及确保乘客的安全与舒适。失误会导致计分器扣分。若分数归零，游戏即结束。
游戏提供以下线路：
1. 从直江津到浦川原的北北线
2. 从盛冈到新花卷的东北新干线
3. 从秋田到大森的秋田新干线
4. 从品川到上野的京滨东北线
5. 从大阪到天王寺的大阪环状线（街机原版中没有此线路）
6. 从博多到小仓的鹿儿岛本线（仅 PlayStation 和 Windows 版本中有此线路）

NAME: Digimon - Ver. WonderSwan
NAME_ZH: 数码宝贝 - WonderSwan版
DESC: Digimon Ver. WonderSwan is a Japanese handheld version of the original Tamagotchi-like Digimon pet for the WonderSwan. It includes all of the original Digimon from the five different pet devices. In this game the player can have up to five different Digim
DESC_ZH: 《数码宝贝 WonderSwan版》是一款为WonderSwan掌机打造的日式掌机游戏，其原型是类似电子鸡的数码宝贝宠物养成游戏。它包含了五款不同宠物设备中的所有原始数码宝贝。在这款游戏中，玩家最多可以拥有五只不同的数码兽

NAME: Digimon Adventure : Anode Tamer
NAME_ZH: 数码宝贝大冒险：阳极驯兽师
DESC:
The game is based on the popular manga series Digimon, which follows the adventures of children who can gain access into the digital world and fight digital monsters there. In this game, the evil Milenniamon has kidnapped several children and is planning to take control over the Digiworld. One of the good monsters, Agumon, escaped, and transported the hero Ryou to the Digiworld. Now Ryou has to fight monsters, capture them, and assemble an army to overthrow Milenniamon and to rescue his friends.
The gameplay involves mainly hunting monsters in dungeons and then sending them to fight other monsters. In the town you can buy supplies and take care of your monsters. The battles are turn-based, and you can move freely over the battle field. Once a contact with an enemy is initiated, an automatic battle sequence follows.
DESC_ZH:
这款游戏基于热门漫画系列《数码宝贝》改编，讲述了孩子们进入数码世界并与数码怪兽战斗的冒险故事。在这款游戏中，邪恶的千年兽绑架了几名儿童，并计划控制数码世界。善良的数码兽之一亚古兽逃脱后，将主角辽传送到了数码世界。现在，辽必须与怪兽战斗、捕捉它们，并组建一支军队来推翻千年兽，拯救他的朋友们。
游戏玩法主要包括在地下城狩猎怪兽，然后派它们与其他怪兽战斗。在城镇中，你可以购买补给品并照顾你的怪兽。战斗采用回合制，你可以在战场上自由移动。一旦与敌人接触，就会触发自动战斗序列。

NAME: Digimon Adventure : Cathode Tamer
NAME_ZH: 数码宝贝大冒险：阴极驯兽师
DESC:
This is the second game in Digimon Adventure series, a kind of an add-on to  Anode Tamer. The game is based on the popular manga Digimon. The hero, a boy named Ryou, has to travel to digital world in order to free his friends from the clutches of the evil digital monster Milenniamon.
The story of this game is identical to that of "Anode Tamer", and gameplay mechanics are exactly the same: you descend into dungeons to fight monsters in turn-based style, capture the monsters after the battles and then send them to fight new ones. The difference between the two games are the monsters themselves: "Cathode Tamers" features a brand new set of monsters, and since the beginning of the game you encounter different foes. The full collection of monsters can be achieved only if you complete both games.
DESC_ZH:
这是《数码宝贝大冒险》系列的第二款游戏，是《阳极驯兽师》的一种资料片。该游戏基于热门漫画《数码宝贝》改编。主角是一个名叫辽的男孩，他必须前往数码世界，将他的朋友们从邪恶数码怪兽千年兽的魔掌中解救出来。
这款游戏的剧情与《阳极驯兽师》相同，游戏机制也完全一样：你深入地下城，以回合制方式与怪物战斗，战斗结束后捕获怪物，然后派它们去挑战新的怪物。两款游戏的区别在于怪物本身：《阴极驯兽师》拥有全新的怪物阵容，从游戏开始你就会遇到不同的敌人。只有完成这两款游戏，才能集齐所有怪物。

NAME: Digimon Adventure 02 : Tag Tamers
NAME_ZH: 数码宝贝大冒险02：搭档驯兽师
DESC:
The game is based on the manga series Digimon, in which children can travel to a digital world and help good digital monsters to defeat evil ones. In this game, the two heroes, Ryou and Ken, are summoned to the Digiworld to fight against the archenemy Millenniumon and his side-kick Diablomon. Upon defeating the two evil monsters once again, the heroes realize that Millenniumon has taken a different shape and is reborn to conquer the Digiworld anew. Now you must recruit digital monsters and lead them into the ultimate battle.
The gameplay follows traditional Digimon outlines: you descend into dungeons and have your monster friends fight other monsters in turn-based combat. Upon returning to the town, you can make those monsters participate in future battles. Unlike the two previous Digimon Adventure games,  Anode and  Cathode Tamers, you cannot move over the battle field.
DESC_ZH:
这款游戏基于漫画系列《数码宝贝》改编，在该系列中，孩子们可以前往数码世界，帮助善良的数码怪兽击败邪恶的数码怪兽。在这款游戏中，两位主角辽和健被召唤到数码世界，与宿敌千年兽及其帮凶恶魔兽展开战斗。再次击败这两只邪恶怪兽后，主角们发现千年兽已改头换面，重生后企图再次征服数码世界。现在，你必须招募数码怪兽，并带领它们投入最终决战。
游戏玩法遵循传统的《数码宝贝》模式：你深入地下城，让你的怪兽伙伴在回合制战斗中与其他怪兽交锋。回到城镇后，你可以让这些怪兽参与未来的战斗。与前两款《数码宝贝大冒险》游戏《阳极驯兽师》和《阴极驯兽师》不同的是，你无法在战场上移动。

NAME: Digital Partner
NAME_ZH: 数字伙伴
DESC: Digital Partner is a Strategy game, developed by Tom Create and published by Bandai, which was released in Japan in 2000.
DESC_ZH: 《数字伙伴》是一款策略游戏，由Tom Create开发，万代发行，于2000年在日本发售。

NAME: Dokodemo Hamster
NAME_ZH: 随时随地的仓鼠
DESC: In this game, you are the owner of a hamster. Your hamster is inside a cage, and is living its life in real time, regardless of your actions, walking around, sleeping, etc. However, you can do many things to help your hamster feel better. There is a list of topics you can "discuss" with the hamster: for example, you can order it to run inside a wheel, or ask it whether it is hungry or not. You can feed it some typical hamster food, clean the cage from time to time, and even write e-mails to your hamster. Depending on your actions the disposition of the hamster will change.
DESC_ZH: 在这款游戏中，你是一只仓鼠的主人。你的仓鼠待在笼子里，无论你做什么，它都在实时地生活着，四处走动、睡觉等等。不过，你可以做很多事情来让你的仓鼠感觉更舒适。有一系列你可以和仓鼠“讨论”的话题：例如，你可以命令它在滚轮里跑步，或者询问它是否饿了。你可以给它喂一些常见的仓鼠食物，时不时清理一下笼子，甚至还能给你的仓鼠写电子邮件。仓鼠的性情会根据你的行为而发生变化。

FILE: D's Garage 21 Koubo Game - Tane o Maku Tori (Japan).zip
NAME: D's Garage 21 Koubo Game : Tane wo Maku Tori
NAME_ZH: D氏车库21工坊游戏：播撒种子的鸟
DESC:
The raven has made a friend. But sorrow be to this raven, for this fellow avian migrates, and will not return for seasons. Filled with sadness and regret the raven takes wing. As he soars through his lonely world his tears begin to fall... and water dying flowers. At last he knows what he must do until his friend returns, he will make new friends in the flowers. He will help them grow and spread their seeds. 
Each level in Tane wo Maku Tori contains four pillars bridged by a series of horizontal or vertical rows. These rows are different for each of the three spaces formed by the pillar. The rows may be moved up and down, one set at a time. At the foot of a column, up to three in harder areas, will be a nascent flower. Water drops will fall along the path of the pillars, which will have a different theme for each level, and eventually either fall onto the ground or a flower. Water drops will always move along a bridge if it intersects their path, drops can't go up diagonals. Drops an combine to create larger faster moving drops. Any more than three drops and it will simply fall off the pillar, or bridge, and be of no use.
When a flower gets enough rain drops, or tear drops, it will bloom, when all the flowers on the stage bloom it will be cleared. 
Enemies also roam the stage, gobbling up hydrogen based solution and plants. They follow the same laws as the drops and will move along beams when encountered, however they can go up vertical beams. Should one reach a flower it will nibble at it until dead. This ends the game; however, enemies can be destroyed by three drops combined. 
A time mode is available where the player picks a difficulty level and then plays on the level until a flower is eaten or they run out of time, each completed flower will add to the time. 
A two player mode is available through the Communication Cable
This game is played vertically.
DESC_ZH:
这只乌鸦交了个朋友。但这只乌鸦很悲伤，因为它的这位鸟类伙伴要迁徙了，好几个季节都不会回来。满心悲伤与遗憾的乌鸦振翅高飞。当它在这孤寂的世界中翱翔时，泪水开始滑落……滋润着濒临枯萎的花朵。最终，它明白了在朋友归来之前自己必须做些什么——它要在花丛中结交新朋友。它要帮助花朵生长、传播种子。
《播撒种子的鸟》的每一关都有四根柱子，由一系列水平或垂直的排连接起来。由柱子形成的三个空间，每个空间的排都各不相同。这些排可以一次移动一组，上下移动。在柱子底部，在较难的区域最多会有三株初绽的花朵。水滴会沿着柱子的路径落下，每一关的柱子都有不同的主题，水滴最终要么落到地面，要么落到花朵上。如果水滴的路径与桥相交，它们总会沿着桥移动，水滴不能沿对角线向上移动。水滴可以合并形成更大、移动更快的水滴。如果超过三滴水，它们就会直接从柱子或桥上掉落，毫无用处。
当一朵花得到足够的雨滴或泪滴时，它就会绽放，当舞台上所有的花都绽放时，这一关就通关了。
敌人也会在舞台上四处游荡，吞食以氢为基础的溶液和植物。它们和水滴遵循同样的规则，遇到横梁时会沿着横梁移动，不过它们可以沿着垂直的横梁向上移动。如果有敌人碰到一朵花，它会一直啃咬，直到花死去。这就意味着游戏结束；不过，三滴水合并可以消灭敌人。
游戏有计时模式，玩家可以选择一个难度级别，然后在该关卡中游戏，直到有一朵花被吃掉或时间耗尽，每成功让一朵花绽放都会增加时间。
通过通信电缆可以开启双人模式。
这款游戏是竖屏游玩的。

NAME: EF-Cribbage (World) (Ja) (v0.28) (Proto) (WonderWitch) (Unl)
NAME_ZH: EF-克里比奇纸牌游戏（全球版）（日语版）（0.28版）（原型）（WonderWitch制作）（未授权）

NAME: Engacho! for Wonderswan
NAME_ZH: Engacho！（万代掌机版）
DESC: Engacho is based on a popular Japanese children game. You play a little boy named Sunzuki, who wants to prove to his angry father that he is not a coward and can stand up against the terrible monsters of the Oops Five group. Those five guys are extremely ugly and can contaminate you with an awful disease the moment they touch you. So you should outsmart them and run away before they can catch you. The gameplay is turn-based.
DESC_ZH: Engacho 改编自一款广受欢迎的日本儿童游戏。你将扮演一个名叫巽月（Sunzuki）的小男孩，他想向愤怒的父亲证明自己不是懦夫，能够对抗“糟糕五人组”的可怕怪物。那五个家伙长得极其丑陋，一旦碰到你，就会让你染上可怕的疾病。所以你要比他们聪明，在被他们抓住之前赶紧逃跑。游戏采用回合制玩法。

FILE: Fever - Sankyo Koushiki Pachinko Simulation for WonderSwan (Japan).zip
NAME: Fever : Sankyo Koushiki Pachinko Simulation
NAME_ZH: 狂热：三协官方弹珠机模拟
DESC:
Fever is a pachinko simulator. Pachinko is a Japanese  cross between a pinball case and a slot machine. This game supplies the player with a number of different pachinko machines, with rotating slot numbers. These can be either in a classic form of rotating wheels or an interactive digital screen. As the balls pop around the pachinko machine they'll land in different areas and effect your earnings. The player can always choose the speed at which balls are being launched onto the field which will change how they land.
This simulator also has a collection hall where the player can use his pachinko earnings to buy gambling machines and related memorabilia. These can be viewed along with information about their history.
DESC_ZH:
《狂热》是一款弹珠机模拟器。弹珠机是日本的一种结合了弹珠台和老虎机特点的游戏。这款游戏为玩家提供了多种不同的弹珠机，带有转动的老虎机数字。这些数字可以呈现在经典的转动轮盘上，也可以显示在交互式数字屏幕上。当弹珠在弹珠机里四处弹射时，它们会落在不同的区域，从而影响你的收益。玩家可以随时选择将弹珠发射到游戏区域的速度，这会改变弹珠的落点。
这个模拟器还有一个收藏馆，玩家可以用玩弹珠机获得的收益购买赌博机及相关纪念品。玩家可以查看这些物品，并了解它们的历史信息。

NAME: Final Lap 2000
NAME_ZH: 最终冲刺2000
DESC:
Final Lap 2000 is the first hand-held incarnation of Namco's Final Lap racing games. 
This version presents a number of modes, a track building feature, and only one vehicle; an open-wheel car.
The modes are as follows:
1. World Tour: in the mode the player will compete against five other racers and progress through many tracks located around the world. Although the graphics are not  very descriptive of location, the course's shape and curves will always change.
2. Arcade: in this classic mode you'll race against a single opponent through one of the many global tracks of your choosing.
3. Time Trial: here the player will attempt to make the best time on a course of his choosing. The player is the only car on the track for this mode.
The track editing feature can only be used to make simple tracks at the start of the game; however, playing the World Tour will unlock new track parts based on your performance. Using the communication cable players can transfer tracks between different copies of Final Lap 2000.
DESC_ZH:
《最终冲刺2000》是南梦宫《最终冲刺》系列赛车游戏的首款掌机版本。
此版本提供了多种模式、赛道建造功能，且只有一种载具：单座敞篷赛车。
模式如下：
1. 世界巡回赛：在该模式中，玩家将与其他五名赛车手竞争，并在世界各地的众多赛道上展开角逐。尽管画面未能很好地体现出赛道的地理位置，但赛道的形状和弯道总会有所变化。
2. 街机模式：在这个经典模式中，你可以选择全球众多赛道中的一条，与一名对手展开比赛。
3. 计时赛：玩家将尝试在自己选择的赛道上跑出最佳成绩。在该模式下，赛道上只有玩家这一辆车。
游戏开始时，赛道编辑功能只能用于创建简单的赛道；不过，在世界巡回赛模式中，根据你的表现，你将解锁新的赛道部件。使用通信电缆，玩家可以在不同的《最终冲刺2000》游戏卡带之间传输赛道。

NAME: Fire Pro Wrestling for WonderSwan
NAME_ZH: 火焰职业摔跤 万代掌机版
DESC:
The first North American release of the Fire Pro Wrestling series comes to the Game Boy Advance.
Fire Pro Wrestling has a stacked roster, comprised of many not-quite-copyright-infringing wrestlers like "The Bionic Man" Steve Majors ("Stone Cold" Steve Austin) and Axe Duggan (Hulk Hogan), making WCW vs. WWF vs. ECW matches possible.  The controls are much more than the typical "mash buttons until something happens" that were so popular in earlier wrestling games, instead relying on timing to properly execute a move or hold.
DESC_ZH:
火焰职业摔跤系列首次在北美地区登陆Game Boy Advance掌机。
火焰职业摔跤拥有庞大的选手阵容，其中包含许多未构成版权侵权的摔跤手，比如“生化人”史蒂夫·梅杰斯（对应“冷石”史蒂夫·奥斯汀）和阿克斯·达根（对应浩克·霍根），这使得WCW（世界冠军摔角）、WWF（世界摔角联盟）和ECW（极端冠军摔角）之间的对决成为可能。 游戏的操作远不止早期摔跤游戏中常见的“狂按按钮直到有动作发生”，而是依靠时机来正确执行招式或控制对手。

FILE: Fishing Freaks - Bass Rise for WonderSwan (Japan).zip
NAME: Fishing Freaks : BassRise for WonderSwan
NAME_ZH: 钓鱼狂人：鲈鱼崛起 万代神奇天鹅版
DESC:
Following in the footsteps of the fishing simulation/rpg Bass Rise this portable remake. Although one can no longer select the gender of  the character there  still remains a great variety of lures and poles to select. As well as five locations. Once a location has been selected a prompt to fill the tacklebox with the lures that and rod that might be most appropriate for the environment. The player then selects where to want to stand on the shore and then the ideal location for a cast.
The view then switches to a closer overhead of the body of water and the player's avatar. A power meter sways over head and should the play manage to stop the meter at just the right point he will be rewarded with his cast going closer to where he intended. Once in the water the player's lure will always be in the center of the screen.
Catching fish is no easy matter as the PlayStation version frequently points out; it is all about finesse. The player will have to entice the fish with wiggles and jolts from the lure... this is of course assuming that the player has selected the right lure. Once a fish is caught a small screen will pop up within the screen, showing a close up of the fish's shadow on the surface of the water. The player will get a chance to see if he hooked something good should the fish jump, as they reel it in.
Records can be shared by means of the Communication Cable.
DESC_ZH:
这款便携重制版游戏延续了钓鱼模拟/角色扮演游戏《鲈鱼崛起》的风格。尽管玩家不能再选择角色的性别，但仍有各种各样的鱼饵和钓竿可供选择，还有五个钓鱼地点。一旦选定地点，游戏会提示玩家用可能最适合该环境的鱼饵和钓竿装满钓具盒。然后玩家选择站在岸边的位置，接着确定理想的抛竿位置。
随后视角切换到水域和玩家角色的近景俯瞰画面。一个力量计量表在上方摆动，如果玩家能在恰到好处的时机停止计量表，抛竿就会更接近他预期的位置。鱼饵入水后，会始终位于屏幕中央。
正如 PlayStation 版本经常指出的，钓鱼绝非易事，关键在于技巧。玩家必须通过鱼饵的摆动和抖动来吸引鱼……当然，这是在玩家选对了鱼饵的前提下。一旦钓到鱼，屏幕上会弹出一个小窗口，显示水面上鱼的影子特写。当玩家收线时，如果鱼跃出水面，就能知道自己是否钓到了好东西。
玩家可以通过通信线分享钓鱼记录。

FILE: From TV Animation One Piece - Mezase Kaizoku Ou! (Japan).zip
NAME: From TV Animation One Piece : Mezase Kaizoku Ou!
NAME_ZH: 电视动画《海贼王》：目标是海贼王！
DESC: From TV Animation One Piece: Mezase Kaizoku Ou! is an Adventure game, developed and published by Bandai, which was released in Japan in 2000.
DESC_ZH: 电视动画《海贼王》：目标是海贼王！是一款冒险游戏，由万代开发并发行，于2000年在日本发售。

NAME: Frontier (World) (Ja) (WonderWitch) (Unl)
NAME_ZH: 边境（世界）（日版）（WonderWitch）（未发行）

NAME: Ganso Jajamaru-kun
NAME_ZH: 原创忍者小贾贾
DESC:
Ganso JaJaMaru-kun is a remake of the NES platformer Ninja JaJaMaru-kun. It includes new levels and bosses that stretch the gameplay in novel ways. 
Lord Namazu Dayuu has kidnapped JaJaMaru-kun's beloved Princess Sakura. This piratical lord is no laughing matter, despite his sadistically gleeful disposition, he possess an army of creatures drawn from Japanese folklore to prevent you from reuniting with your princess ever again.
DESC_ZH:
《原创忍者小贾贾》是NES平台游戏《忍者小贾贾》的重制版。它包含新关卡和新BOSS，以新颖的方式拓展了游戏玩法。

鲶鱼大人绑架了小贾贾心爱的樱花公主。这位海盗领主可不好对付，尽管他有着残忍的愉悦性情，但他拥有一支由日本民间传说中的生物组成的军队，阻止你与公主再次团聚。

NAME: GB Yu-Gi-Oh Database (World) (Ja) (WonderWitch) (Unl)
NAME_ZH: GB 游戏王数据库（全球版）（日版）（WonderWitch）（未授权）

NAME: Gomoku Narabe & Reversi : Touryuumon
NAME_ZH: 五子棋与黑白棋：流浪门
DESC:
A simple collection of two classic puzzle games Gomoku Narabe & Reversi/Othello.
Gomoku Narabe, is a ancient Japanese game the title of which means "five stones in a row". The goal of the game is to place five tokens of your color (white or black) in a row. Of course your opponent will be trying to block you. The game ends when  a player achieves tis penta-worthy task. The board is 14 x 14.
Reversi is a game commonly know under the name that it is marketed by Pressman, Othello. In reversi ones goal is to flip the opponents tiles (white or black) by surrounding the opposing token(s) on either end with your own. The board is 8x8.
A challenge mode approaches! You can battle your way through ranks of board game master beginning with a horrid smiling goblin and moving up to a mysterious old guru.
Two players can play the game through the Communication Cable, which is odd as it would seem feasible to play the games on a single system, but what can ya do?
DESC_ZH:
这是两款经典益智游戏——五子棋与黑白棋的简单合集。
五子棋是一款古老的日本游戏，其名称意为“连成五子”。游戏目标是将你所选颜色（白色或黑色）的五颗棋子连成一线。当然，你的对手会试图阻止你。当一名玩家达成这一五子连珠的任务时，游戏结束。棋盘为14×14。
黑白棋通常以Pressman公司推广的名称“奥赛罗棋”为人所知。在黑白棋中，玩家的目标是通过用自己的棋子从两端包围对手的棋子（白色或黑色），将其翻转成自己的颜色。棋盘为8×8。
挑战模式来袭！你可以从一个咧嘴坏笑的小妖精开始，一路挑战各级棋盘游戏高手，直至挑战神秘的老宗师。
两名玩家可以通过通信线进行对战，不过在同一台设备上玩这些游戏似乎也可行，这有点奇怪，但也没办法啦。

NAME: Goraku Ou Tango!
NAME_ZH: 娱乐王单词！
DESC:
Go Raku Ou Tango! is a simple word game mimicking the puzzles found in the pages of popular printed Japanese word-puzzle publisher Sekai Bunka. These puzzles consist of taking words writing in English and the two syllabaries of Japan Hiragana, or Katakana, and moving tiles around beneath the word(s) to recreate them in a different writing style. There are several variants on this gameplay.
There is a story mode featuring a family of archaeologists who are digging up Japanese orthography across the globe. Sweden, for instance, is known not only as being the home of lost Atlantis but also troves of buried Japanese writing! A family member is missing perhaps there will be clues in this the ruins of these global ancient Japanese ruins? By completing the puzzles you will get to see a scene and a new more difficult puzzle.
DESC_ZH:
《娱乐王单词！》是一款简单的文字游戏，模仿了日本流行印刷文字谜题出版商“世界文化社”（Sekai Bunka）出版物中的谜题。这些谜题是将用英文以及日语的两种音节文字——平假名或片假名书写的单词，通过移动单词下方的字母块，以不同的书写形式重新组合这些单词。游戏玩法有几种不同的变体。

游戏中有一个故事模式，主角是一个考古学家家族，他们在全球各地挖掘日语文字。例如，瑞典不仅被认为是失落的亚特兰蒂斯的所在地，还埋藏着大量日语文字！有一名家族成员失踪了，也许在这些全球各地的古代日语遗迹中会有线索？通过完成谜题，你将看到一段剧情，并解锁一道更难的新谜题。

NAME: GunPey
NAME_ZH: 西部炸弹消消乐
DESC: Gunpey is a puzzle game set in the wild west. Your goal is to connect pieces of fuses to get one long fuse going across the board, making it explode and disappear. There are several game modes in Gunpey, such as the classical puzzle game modes "Endless mode", where you can either play until you mess up or timed, either for 2 or 5 minutes. "Stage mode", where you have to clear a certain amount of tiles before advancing to the next stage. "Puzzle mode", where you have a set amount of fuse pieces and you need to make them all go away in one explosion. And finally "Vs. mode", where you can face off against a friend.
DESC_ZH: 《西部炸弹消消乐》是一款以狂野西部为背景的益智游戏。你的目标是连接导火索碎片，形成一条贯穿整个棋盘的长导火索，使其爆炸并消失。《西部炸弹消消乐》有多种游戏模式，例如经典的益智游戏模式“无尽模式”，你可以一直玩到失误为止，也可以选择限时模式，限时2分钟或5分钟。“关卡模式”中，你需要清除一定数量的方块才能进入下一关卡。“解谜模式”里，你会获得一定数量的导火索碎片，需要让它们在一次爆炸中全部消失。最后是“对战模式”，你可以与朋友一决高下。

DESC: Kakutou Ryouri Densetsu Bistro Recipe: Wonder Battle Hen is a Strategy game, developed and published by Banpresto, which was released in Japan in 1999. In a world where talented cooks turn tasty food into monsters called Foodons, amateur chef Zen travels on a world cruise working his way up to win tournaments and become a Foodon champion. Cooking to create a new Foodon requires timed inputs which, if done perfectly, can earn an S-rank which adds an additional skill to the new Foodon. There about 100 different Foodons of types Japanese, Chinese, Western, and Ethnic. Foodons gain experience if they win against opponents in battles. Foodons can also be boosted by toppings that compliments the dish they are based on.
DESC_ZH: 《格斗料理传说 小餐馆食谱：梦幻之战》是一款策略游戏，由万代南梦宫旗下的万普（Banpresto）开发并发行，于1999年在日本发售。在这个世界里，厨艺精湛的厨师能将美味佳肴变成名为“食物兽”的怪物。业余厨师禅开启了环球之旅，他一路参加比赛，努力成为食物兽冠军。烹饪创造新的食物兽需要把握时机进行操作，如果操作完美，就能获得S级评价，为新食物兽增添一项额外技能。大约有100种不同类型的食物兽，包括日式、中式、西式和民族风味。食物兽在战斗中战胜对手就能获得经验。食物兽还可以通过与它们所基于的菜肴相搭配的配料来提升能力。

NAME: Kaze no Klonoa : Moonlight Museum
NAME_ZH: 风之克罗诺亚：月光博物馆
DESC:
In this game, you control a boy named Klonoa. One day he sees a dream in which he learns that somebody has stolen a fragment of the moon. He is told that the thieves are probably some painters who took the moon fragment into a museum. As Klonoa enters the music, he gets teleported into a mysterious world. Now he has to use his wit in order to overcome all the obstacles in this world and retrieve the moon fragment.
Kaze no Klonoa: Moonlight Museum is a platform game with an emphasis on puzzle-solving. The enemies you encounter can be inflated with the help of Klonoa's yo-yo, and carried around. You can throw them at other enemies, or use them to jump to higher ledges. In addition, there are various kinds of symbols you have to collect to open locked doors, teleporters, switches, time bombs, and other ingredients for puzzles.
DESC_ZH:
在这款游戏中，你将操控一个名叫克罗诺亚的男孩。有一天，他做了个梦，得知有人偷走了一块月亮碎片。他被告知，小偷可能是一些把月亮碎片带到博物馆的画家。当克罗诺亚走进那片音乐之境时，他被传送到了一个神秘世界。现在，他必须运用自己的智慧，克服这个世界里的所有障碍，找回月亮碎片。
《风之克罗诺亚：月光博物馆》是一款注重解谜的平台游戏。你遇到的敌人可以借助克罗诺亚的溜溜球将其吹胀，然后带着走。你可以把它们扔向其他敌人，或者利用它们跳到更高的平台上。此外，你还必须收集各种符号来打开锁着的门、传送器、开关、定时炸弹以及其他解谜要素。

NAME: Kyousouba Ikusei Simulation : Keiba
NAME_ZH: 竞马场育成模拟：赛马
DESC:
This game begins by asking you to name your own stable, and then your first horse, quickly introducing you to the world of this horse raising, breeding, and racing game. The majority of the gameplay focuses on micromanaging your horses training and care. You an select the races that you think you're horse is ready for in an attempt to win coveted ribbons, and wealth beyond the dreams of avarice!
Once you enter a race you'll be taken out of control and see if all you're hard work has payed off as your beast makes it around the track. An announcer follows the competition of there Muybridge wannabes, narrating what you see.
Regardless how good your horse is it will be economically prudent to continue its line. Through shrewd husbandry you can translate the positive traits of race horse to a new generation. You'll be able to select a proper mate from other stables. 
Horse information and stable data can be shared with other players via the Communication Cable.
DESC_ZH:
这款游戏一开始会让你为自己的马厩命名，接着为你的第一匹马取名，迅速带你进入这个养马、繁育和赛马的游戏世界。

游戏的大部分玩法都集中在对马匹训练和照料的精细管理上。你可以挑选你认为马匹已准备好参加的比赛，努力赢取令人梦寐以求的缎带和超乎想象的财富！

一旦你让马匹参赛，你就无法再操控，只能看着你的骏马在赛道上奔跑，看看你所有的辛勤付出是否有了回报。一位解说员会跟进这些“穆伊布里奇模仿者”的比赛，为你所看到的场景进行解说。

无论你的马有多优秀，从经济角度考虑，延续它的血脉都是明智之举。通过精明的繁育管理，你可以将赛马的优良特质传承给新一代。你可以从其他马厩中挑选合适的配偶。

马匹信息和马厩数据可以通过通信线与其他玩家共享。

NAME: Langrisser Millennium WS : The Last Century
NAME_ZH: 兰古瑞萨千年纪WS：最后的世纪
DESC:
"Langrisser Millennium" is yet another installment of the long-running Japanese strategy RPG series. You control five main characters: Taji, a young boy whom was chosen as the ruler of the country Salem; Nei Lee Sun, the ruler of Chin, who helps Taji when he gets involved in a war; Masariva, a half-beast and a former slave who became a queen, but preferred the life of a wanderer; Rumaty Marf, the queen of the country Misla, on a quest for an angel who appeared in her dream; and Saryune, the ruler of Vidern, whose only desire is power. Those five rulers meet each other, when they get involved in a war with hostile countries. However, soon they learn a greater evil has appeared in the world - they must reach a faraway island to prevent the reincarnation of an evil god...
The gameplay "Langrisser Millenium" is divided into "Map Mode" and "Battle Mode". In map mode, you move your characters over a map, trying to reach enemy fortresses and to prevent the enemy to reach yours. Everything happens in real time: if you do nothing, the enemy will come and conquer your country. Once in battle mode, you control several teams. You only assign actions to the team leaders, while others fight automatically in round-based strategy combat.

NAME: Lode Runner for WonderSwan
NAME_ZH: 神奇天鹅掌机版淘金者
DESC:
The Bungeling Empire has stolen a huge cache of gold from its rightful owners, and your mission is to infiltrate its treasury and recapture it. This entails progressing through 150 screens of platforms, ladders and ropes.
The Empire has sent robotic guards down to protect the gold, and contact with any of these will cost you a life. Your method of escaping them is to press fire to dig a hole in their line of movement, thus causing them to fall in briefly, allowing you to move across the gap safely. Once all the gold has been collected, a ladder allowing you to move onto the next screen is added. Completing these screens often requires forward planning and precision.
This was one of the earliest games to include a level editor, allowing the creation of new level designs with no programming skill.
DESC_ZH:
邦格林帝国从合法所有者手中偷走了大量黄金，你的任务是潜入其金库并夺回这些黄金。这需要你通过150个包含平台、梯子和绳索的关卡。
帝国派遣了机器人警卫来保护黄金，一旦与任何一个警卫接触，你就会失去一条生命。你摆脱它们的方法是按下射击键，在它们的移动路线上挖一个洞，使它们暂时掉进去，这样你就可以安全地穿过缺口。当所有的黄金都被收集完毕后，会出现一个梯子，让你进入下一个关卡。完成这些关卡通常需要提前规划和精准操作。
这是最早包含关卡编辑器的游戏之一，无需编程技能即可创建新的关卡设计。

This is a puzzle game in which different balloons are falling down and you must match three balloons of the same type to make them disappear and to prevent them from crushing you. The player character is running sideways on the bottom of the top-down screen, and is shooting the balloons to make them change shapes and match each other. There are different player characters, all of which are Tarot cards: Demon, Justice, Priestess, etc. Each character shoots a different kind of special ball, which can be matched against any combination of other two.

NAME: Medarot Perfect Edition : Kabuto Version
NAME_ZH: 金属机器人完美版：独角仙版
DESC:
Medarot: Perfect Edition is a RPG developed by Natsume and published by Imagineer in 1999 for the WonderSwan, and is a "director's cut" edition of the original game released on the Nintendo Game Boy in 1997. 
It follows Hikaru Agata on his quest to compete in Robottle tournaments and defeat the evil Roborobo Gang. It was released in two versions: Kabuto (Rhinoceros beetle), where the player's starting Medarot is Metal Beetle, and Kuwagata (Stag beetle), where the player starts with Head Scissors.
DESC_ZH:
《金属机器人：完美版》是一款由夏目社开发、Imagineer于1999年为万代神奇天鹅掌机发行的角色扮演游戏，它是1997年在任天堂Game Boy上发行的原版游戏的“导演剪辑版”。
它讲述了赤田光在机器人对战锦标赛中参赛并击败邪恶的机器机器人团伙的冒险故事。该游戏有两个版本：独角仙版，玩家初始的金属机器人是金属甲虫；锹形虫版，玩家初始的金属机器人是剪刀头。

NAME: Meitantei Conan : Majutsushi no Chousenjou!
NAME_ZH: 名侦探柯南：魔术师的挑战状！
DESC:
Conan Edogawa is the pseudonym of Shin'ichi Kudo, but more than just a pseudonym, a pseudoform. Shin'ichi Kudo, an inquisitive seventeen year old student, was investigating a blackmail case when attacked by members of the Black Organization. He was forced to take an experimental APTX 4869 drug which caused, in a rare side-effect, his body to transform into that of a seven-year-old. 
This does not stop Shin'ichi, adopting the name Conan Edogawa he moves in with Ran Mori, his childhood friend and sweetheart. Enrolling in a elementary school to complete his disguise he vows to find out who is backing the Black Organization, and to have his revenge. With the help of his his oddball classmates, an ex-member of the Black Organization Ai Haibara, whose also been turned into a child, and his beloved he just might do it...
The games story follows the Conan through his school life which intertwines with his search for justice. He forms a Junior Detective League in his school to help him out. This cast of characters will help supply you information throughout the game.
The gameplay consists of using a map screen to travel to a number of areas collecting clues for the case you are on. Each area offers you the ability to examine the area, talk to bystanders, collect items, and sometimes attack if a threat is apparent. 
After collecting information you will have the chance to open your notebook, which will cause the WonderSwan to switch to a vertical orientation, and review your information. Also in the note books is a logic grid. On the grid you will have to select where you've deduced something intersects,who was at the scene at what time, by marking it with a circle and voiding all impossibilities with crosses. Once you've completed an entire grid you'll be able to present your deductions or press a point further allowing you to progress. If you've gotten your reasoning wrong, however, it is back to the drawing board and time to recheck you evidence and maybe time to see if you missed some clues.
This game includes five scenarios, roughly translated to English as:
1. Continuous high school girl kidnapping
2. Murder on the suspense drama set
3. Jack the Ripper murder
 
The mysteries incident's letter of notice
4. Treasure cases at the end of the century
DESC_ZH:
江户川柯南是工藤新一的化名，但这不仅仅是个化名，更是一种伪装形态。工藤新一是个充满好奇心的十七岁学生，他在调查一起敲诈勒索案时遭到了黑衣组织成员的袭击。他被迫服用了实验性药物APTX4869，这种药物产生了罕见的副作用，使他的身体变成了七岁小孩的模样。

这并没有阻止新一，他化名江户川柯南，住进了儿时好友兼恋人毛利兰的家中。为了完善伪装，他进入一所小学就读，并誓言要找出黑衣组织的幕后主使，为自己报仇。在他那些古怪同学的帮助下，还有同样变成小孩的黑衣组织前成员灰原哀以及他心爱的人，他或许能够实现这个目标……

游戏的故事围绕着柯南的校园生活展开，同时也穿插着他对正义的追寻。他在学校成立了少年侦探团来协助自己。在整个游戏过程中，这些角色会为你提供信息。

游戏玩法包括使用地图界面前往多个区域，为你正在调查的案件收集线索。每个区域都允许你检查现场、与旁观者交谈、收集物品，有时如果有明显的威胁还可以进行攻击。

收集完信息后，你将有机会打开笔记本，此时万代WonderSwan掌机会切换到竖屏模式，你可以查看收集到的信息。笔记本中还有一个逻辑表格。在表格中，你必须通过画圈标记出你推断出的交叉点，即某人在某个时间出现在现场的情况，并通过打叉排除所有不可能的情况。一旦你完成了整个表格，你就可以提出你的推理，或者进一步强调某个要点，从而推动游戏进程。然而，如果你推理错误，就必须重新开始，重新检查证据，也许还得看看是否遗漏了一些线索。

这款游戏包含五个场景，大致翻译成英文如下：
1. 连续高中女生绑架案
2. 悬疑剧片场谋杀案
3. 开膛手杰克谋杀案
神秘事件通知信
4. 世纪末的宝藏案件

FILE: Meitantei Conan - Nishi no Meitantei Saidai no Kiki! (Japan).zip
NAME: Meitantei Conan : Nishi no Meitantei Saidai no Kiki
NAME_ZH: 名侦探柯南：西部名侦探最大危机
DESC:
Detective Conan returns to the WonderSwans continuing his efforts to thwart the dreaded Black Organization. The game features new mysteries and new characters from the Conan universe. 
New features include finding keys. Keys represent actual bits of evidence you can use to solve the logic puzzles in the game once you find all the keys you will be able to attempt to solve the puzzle. However, often in the search for keys one finds hints. Hints are bits of information that will point you in the right direction of a key. Hints also be presented, singularly or combined, to various people in an attempt to extract information, or keys. Once you have all the keys you will be able to have an entire logic grid, otherwise there will be grayed out areas on the grid.
There is also now a mode in some cases where Conan will have to chase the suspect through several areas before subduing him. 
The game records your information at the start of the game to work a character based off of you into the game. This character can be swapped with other owners of 
Meitantei Conan: Nishi no Meitantei Saidai no Kiki !? through the Communication Cable.
This game alternates between horizontal display for regular play and investigation, and vertical display for Conan's detective notebook.
DESC_ZH:
名侦探柯南回归到WonderSwan平台，继续努力挫败可怕的黑衣组织。游戏包含了柯南世界中的新谜团和新角色。
新功能包括寻找钥匙。钥匙代表着实际的证据，一旦你找到所有钥匙，就可以用来解开游戏中的逻辑谜题。然而，在寻找钥匙的过程中，常常会发现线索。线索是能为你指明找到钥匙的正确方向的信息。线索也可以单独或组合起来呈现给不同的人，以试图获取信息或钥匙。一旦你拥有了所有钥匙，就可以得到完整的逻辑网格，否则网格上会有灰色区域。
在某些情况下，现在还有一种模式，柯南必须在几个区域中追捕嫌疑人，然后将其制服。
游戏在开始时会记录你的信息，以便将基于你的角色融入游戏。这个角色可以通过通信线与其他《名侦探柯南：西部名侦探最大危机》的玩家进行交换！
这款游戏在常规游玩和调查时采用横向显示，而在查看柯南的侦探笔记时则采用纵向显示。

DESC_ZH: 《潜入治疗：嘿，听着！》是一款策略游戏，由吉田山工作室开发，媒体娱乐公司发行，于2000年在日本发售。

NAME: Mingle Magnet
NAME_ZH: 磁力融合
DESC:
Mingle Magnet is a simple puzzle game of the falling block variety. The player oversees a 10 x 10 square field where the first four rows (three on easy) have been filled by blocks. Each block shows one of three symbols, a dark gray circle, a light gray circle, and a white circle. When ever any of blocks with matching symbols touch they will form a link. By moving the cursor over a chain and clicking on it the player will be given points based on its size on the chain will be removed. The goal is to get a large score while making sure that new pieces can still enter the field. Once no more pieces can enter the game ends. Blocks fall at the same time one square apart, when the next set of blocks fall they will occupy the space given by the previous drop.
The "magnet" aspect of Mingle Magnet come into play in how the player can control the placement of the blocks. All the blocks are attracted to a magnet which, although not seen, can be placed on any side of the field. All blocks will be drawn to the magnet. For example, if one has the magnet at the south of the field and then puts it to the north what was the top of the block pile will now be the bottom, and blocks will fall onto what was the bottom. The direction of the magnet is indicated by a magnetic field animation behind the action.
This game is played vertically.
DESC_ZH:
《磁力融合》是一款简单的下落方块类益智游戏。玩家要管理一个 10×10 的方形区域，其中前四行（简单模式下为三行）已被方块填满。每个方块显示三种符号之一：深灰色圆圈、浅灰色圆圈和白色圆圈。只要带有相同符号的方块相互接触，它们就会形成连接。玩家将光标移到一条链上并点击，就会根据链的长度获得相应分数，同时该链会被消除。游戏目标是在确保新方块仍能进入区域的同时获得高分。一旦没有新方块可以进入，游戏就结束。方块同时下落，彼此相隔一格，当下一组方块下落时，它们会占据上一组方块落下后腾出的空间。
《磁力融合》的“磁力”机制体现在玩家对方块放置位置的控制上。所有方块都会被一个看不见的磁铁吸引，这个磁铁可以放置在区域的任意一侧。所有方块都会被吸向磁铁。例如，如果玩家将磁铁放在区域的南侧，然后移到北侧，原本方块堆的顶部就会变成底部，方块会落在原本的底部位置。磁铁的方向通过游戏画面背后的磁场动画来显示。
这款游戏是竖屏游玩的。

NAME: Shin Seiki Evangelion : Shito Ikusei
NAME_ZH: 新世纪福音战士：使徒养成
DESC:
Neon Genesis Evangelion Shito Ikusei is a Japanese video game for the WonderSwan which was developed by Gainax and published by Bandai in 1999. 
This game has Tamagotchi-elements to it. You play as Ryoji Kaji. You have to take care of Adam, or "Shito" as it is named in the game, in an embryonic state. You'll be able to make it evolve through different options. It will evolve into different forms depending of its stats. You can then make it battle the three Evangelions of Shinji, Rei and Asuka. 
You can also explore different places from the Evangelion anime as Kaji himself, talk to different characters and acquire different items for Shito.
DESC_ZH:
《新世纪福音战士：使徒养成》是一款为万代WonderSwan掌机开发的日本电子游戏，由GAINAX开发、万代于1999年发行。
这款游戏包含电子宠物元素。你将扮演加持良治。你需要照顾处于胚胎状态的亚当，也就是游戏中所称的“使徒”。你可以通过不同选项让它进化。根据其各项属性，它会进化成不同形态。然后你可以让它与碇真嗣、绫波丽和明日香的三台福音战士战斗。
你还可以以加持良治的身份探索《新世纪福音战士》动画中的不同地点，与不同角色交谈，并为使徒获取不同物品。

NAME: Nobunaga no Yabou
NAME_ZH: 信长之野望
DESC:
In the 16th century, Japan's Sengoku period divided the nation into numerous feudal states, each ruled by a daimyo. Many dreamt of conquering the land, becoming the Shogun and ruling the entire country. One of those daimyos was the ambitious Nobunaga Oda, a merciless ruler and a renowned strategist. Players take on the role of Nobunaga Oda or one of many other daimyos to try to conquer Japan. 
 
Nobunaga's Ambition is a turn-based strategy game which can be played in different modes.  Players begin by selecting either a 17 regions scenario or a larger 50 scenario. Then, the player must select a daimyo, each of which is rated attributes in several categories; Age, Health, Ambition, Luck, Charm and IQ. As the game progresses, these values change depending on events in the game. The age value represents a time limit of sorts, as an elderly daimyo becomes increasingly likely to die of old age or sickness.
DESC_ZH:
16世纪，日本战国时期将国家分割成众多封建领地，每个领地都由一位大名统治。许多人梦想着征服这片土地，成为将军并统治整个国家。其中一位大名便是野心勃勃的织田信长，他是一位冷酷无情的统治者，也是一位著名的战略家。玩家可以扮演织田信长或其他众多大名之一，尝试征服日本。

《信长之野望》是一款回合制策略游戏，有多种不同的游戏模式。玩家可以先选择17个地区的剧本或更大的50个地区的剧本。然后，玩家必须选择一位大名，每位大名在多个类别中都有属性评级，包括年龄、健康、野心、运气、魅力和智力。随着游戏的进行，这些数值会根据游戏中的事件而变化。年龄数值在某种程度上代表着时间限制，因为年迈的大名越来越有可能因年老或疾病去世。

NAME: Ou-chan no Oekaki Logic
NAME_ZH: 小樱的绘画逻辑
DESC:
Ou-chan no Oekaki Logic is a digital conversion, with anime mascots, of the classic Japanese newspaper puzzle nonograms. A nonogram is a puzzle on a square or rectangular grid the object of which is to reveal a hidden picture. Along each row and column there is a number or series of numbers which indicate how many squares will be colored in that row or grid. Example; "5 9 4" would mean there would be sets of five, nine, and four colored squares in the grid, in that order, with at least one blank in between. 
Ou-chan no Oekaki Logic adds a story mode where Ou-Chan, representing the player, competes with other blobby anime characters in finding hidden images in the nonogram grids.
DESC_ZH:
《小樱的绘画逻辑》是一款将经典日本报纸谜题——填色游戏进行数字化改编的游戏，游戏中有动漫吉祥物。填色游戏是一种在正方形或长方形网格上进行的谜题，目标是揭示隐藏的图片。沿着每一行和每一列都有一个数字或一系列数字，这些数字表示该行或该列中将被涂色的方块数量。例如；“5 9 4”表示在网格中会依次有一组五个、一组九个和一组四个涂色方块，每组之间至少有一个空白方块。
《小樱的绘画逻辑》增加了一个故事模式，在这个模式中，代表玩家的小樱会与其他可爱的动漫角色竞争，在填色游戏网格中寻找隐藏的图像。

NAME: Pocket Fighter
NAME_ZH: 口袋格斗家
DESC:
Pocket Fighter is a crossover fighting game that takes characters from the Street Fighter, Darkstalkers, and Red Earth fighting series, and presents them in a cute shrunken chibi form with ridiculous moves and costumes. The games fights take place in various Capcom locations. 
The game uses the same super deformed character designs previously used in Super Puzzle Fighter II Turbo, including characters from Street Fighter Alpha 2 and Night Warriors: Darkstalkers' Revenge, Ibuki from Street Fighter III, and Tessa from Red Earth. It also features many character cameos from various Capcom games scattered in the background of the stages.
DESC_ZH:
《口袋格斗家》是一款跨界格斗游戏，它选取了《街头霸王》《恶魔战士》和《红土》等格斗系列中的角色，并将他们以可爱的缩小Q版形象呈现，搭配滑稽的招式和服装。游戏中的战斗在卡普空旗下的多个场景中展开。
该游戏沿用了此前《超级方块格斗2 Turbo》中使用过的超级变形角色设计，其中包括《街头霸王Alpha 2》和《夜战士：恶魔战士复仇》里的角色、《街头霸王3》中的伊吹，以及《红土》中的泰莎。此外，在各个关卡的背景中还散布着许多来自卡普空不同游戏的角色客串形象。

NAME: Puyo Puyo Tsuu
NAME_ZH: 噗哟噗哟通
DESC:
A falling block game in which the goal is the combine four or more blocks of the same color which then disappear. The remain blocks will fall down and can produce combos which can cause special blocks (can only be destroyed by eliminating adjunct blocks) to appear at the enemies field.
This game includes a story mode, in which Arle (the main character) fights against computer enemies, a vs player mode, a four player mode (SNES only), and an endless mode (SNES only).
DESC_ZH:
这是一款落块游戏，目标是将四个或更多相同颜色的方块组合在一起，然后这些方块会消失。剩余的方块会掉落，并可能产生连锁反应，使特殊方块（只能通过消除相邻方块来摧毁）出现在对手的游戏区域。
这款游戏包含故事模式，在该模式中，主角阿露（Arle）与电脑对手战斗；还有玩家对战模式、四人模式（仅超级任天堂版）和无尽模式（仅超级任天堂版）。

NAME: Puzzle Bobble
NAME_ZH: 泡泡龙
DESC: Bust-A-Move (also known as Puzzle Bobble) is a real-time puzzle game in which the player controls a device called "pointer" at the bottom of the screen, aiming and releasing randomly colored bubbles upwards. Depending on the aiming, the bubbles may float
DESC_ZH: 《泡泡射击》（也被称为《泡泡龙》）是一款实时解谜游戏，玩家在屏幕底部操控一个名为“指针”的装置，向上瞄准并发射随机颜色的泡泡。根据瞄准情况，泡泡可能会漂浮。

NAME: Rainbow Islands : Putty's Party
NAME_ZH: 彩虹岛：帕蒂的派对
DESC:
A spin-off of the Rainbow Islands games, this title features Putty instead of the classic Bub & Bob. Like the previous games set on the island the character's main tools and weapons are rainbows. These rainbows can be walked on to scale heights or cover gaps. Rainbows can also be used to kill enemies by striking them with the arc as it is created, or after it has taken form jumping on it so that it breaks and the shards rain death on those below. Enemies can also be trapped in rainbows. Enemies killed by rainbow shards will sometimes drop a special item or a gem. A series of gems are needed to properly clear each level.
The goal of each area, aside from collecting gems, is to scale to the top of the island. Islands are made out of a series of themed platforms covered with associated enemies. These areas are scattered with items, mostly food, that will increase your score. Sometimes a rainbow will dislodge hidden food or an enemy will drop some when killed. If your score is high enough you will start to  send out more than one rainbow at a time. At the end of each island there will be a boss. If you fulfilled certain requirements in the level you may get a special item.
The islands in this game are, here listed with their theme:
1. Insect Island: Insects and nature
2. Monster Island: Classic horror monsters
3. Doh Island: Geometric
4. Darius Island: Machines
This game plays vertically.
DESC_ZH:
作为《彩虹岛》系列游戏的衍生作品，这款游戏的主角是帕蒂，而非经典的巴布和鲍勃。和之前以该岛为背景的游戏一样，主角的主要工具和武器是彩虹。玩家可以在彩虹上行走，借此攀爬高处或跨越沟壑。彩虹还能用来消灭敌人，既可以在彩虹形成时用弧形部分撞击敌人，也可以在彩虹成型后跳上去，使其破碎，让碎片如雨般砸向下方的敌人。敌人也能被困在彩虹里。被彩虹碎片消灭的敌人有时会掉落特殊物品或宝石。要想顺利通关每一关，需要收集一系列宝石。
除了收集宝石，每个区域的目标是登上岛屿的顶端。岛屿由一系列主题平台构成，上面分布着相应的敌人。这些区域散落着各种物品，大多是食物，收集它们可以增加分数。有时彩虹会震出隐藏的食物，敌人被消灭时也可能掉落食物。如果你的分数足够高，一次就能发射不止一道彩虹。每座岛屿的尽头都会有一个首领。如果你在关卡中满足了特定条件，可能会获得一件特殊物品。
这款游戏中的岛屿及其主题如下：
1. 昆虫岛：昆虫与自然
2. 怪物岛：经典恐怖怪物
3. 多岛：几何图形
4. 大鹫岛：机械
这款游戏为纵向玩法。

NAME: Ring Infinity
NAME_ZH: 午夜凶铃：无限轮回
DESC:
Finally, "Ring" has appeared as the second novel in the Theater! 
The curse of the "Ring" that has infected novels, movies, TV dramas and all kinds of media has finally involved Wonder Swan! 
The first "TERRORS" that was popular as a novel theater. The characteristic of "Ring ∞" is that the power of "TERRORS" is greatly improved in the quality of graphics and sound. In addition, the text is a little larger than "TERRORS", so the readability of the text is considerably improved. In terms of systems, more thrilling improvements have been made, such as the addition of "normal branch" and "branch by teller points" and "branch by time". 
The player becomes the main character who has watched Sadako's video and advances the game. Naturally, the scenario uses a multi-ending style, so even if you can survive and finish the scenario safely, it is not the end of the game. From there, a new "Ring" story begins. Then, as I play a number of scenarios, the truth gradually becomes clear... 
This software supports Wonder Gate, so if you download new data using Wonder Gate, you can enjoy additional scenarios from the perspective of the hero's best friend.
DESC_ZH:
终于，《午夜凶铃》作为剧场系列的第二部小说登场了！
那诅咒着小说、电影、电视剧以及各类媒体的“午夜凶铃”诅咒，终于蔓延到了万代神奇天鹅掌机上！
首部作品《恐怖剧场》作为小说剧场大受欢迎。《午夜凶铃：无限轮回》的特色在于，在画面和音效质量上，《恐怖剧场》的表现力得到了极大提升。此外，文字比《恐怖剧场》稍大一些，因此文字的可读性也有了显著提高。在系统方面，进行了更惊险的改进，例如增加了“普通分支”“根据讲述者点数分支”和“根据时间分支”。
玩家将扮演观看了贞子录像带的主角来推进游戏。自然，剧情采用了多结局模式，所以即使你能存活下来并安全通关，也并非游戏的终点。从那里开始，一个全新的“午夜凶铃”故事将拉开帷幕。接着，随着你游玩多个剧情，真相将逐渐浮出水面……
本软件支持神奇之门功能，因此，如果你使用神奇之门下载新数据，就可以从主角挚友的视角体验额外的剧情。

NAME: Robot Works
NAME_ZH: 机器人工坊
DESC:
The WonderBorg is a programmable consumer robot kit that was bundled with specialized software known as "Robot Works", which is used to program the robot.  
 
While mainly used to program the movement of the physical robot, it also comes with a game where your aim is to get a virtual WonderBorg from start to finish with predetermined instructions: you first see the map, then give a series of instructions "two forward, turn left, one forward" etc and then run your program to see whether you managed to get the robot over the finish line.
DESC_ZH:
WonderBorg是一款可编程的消费级机器人套件，它附带了一款名为“机器人工坊”的专业软件，用于对机器人进行编程。

该软件主要用于对实体机器人的移动进行编程，同时它还包含一款游戏。在游戏中，你的目标是通过预先设定的指令，让虚拟的WonderBorg从起点到达终点：你首先会看到地图，然后给出一系列指令，如“前进两步，左转，前进一步”等，接着运行你的程序，看看是否能让机器人越过终点线。

FILE: Rockman & Forte - Mirai Kara no Chousensha (Japan).zip
NAME: Rockman & Forte : Mirai Kara no Chousensha
NAME_ZH: 洛克人 & 佛特：来自未来的挑战者
DESC: Join Mega Man and Bass's fight for humankind as you face off with the newest menace in town--Robot King. King's captured all of the data plans for Dr. Wily's creations. They will equip King with all the knowledge he needs to build his own indestructible army of robots. As either Mega Man or Bass, you'll set out separate adventures using a variety of battle moves and weapons to defeat robot masters. Hidden bolts and CDs give you extra items to assist in battles.
DESC_ZH: 加入洛克人与佛特为人类而战的行列，对抗小镇上最新的威胁——机械王。机械王窃取了威利博士所有机械人的设计资料。这些资料将让机械王拥有足够的知识，打造出一支无敌的机械大军。你可以选择扮演洛克人或佛特，展开各自的冒险，运用各种战斗招式和武器击败机械首领。隐藏的能量螺栓和光盘能为你提供额外道具，助你在战斗中一臂之力。

NAME: Sangokushi For Wonderswan
NAME_ZH: 三国志 万代掌机版
DESC:
Sangokushi, or Romance of the Three Kingdoms, is a video game based on the historical novel of the same name by Luo Guanzhong. It was developed and published by Koei in 1999 for the WonderSwan. 
The game casts the player in the role of one of the many warlords rivaling for control after the Yellow Turban Rebellion. 
This turn-based strategy game introduces hundreds of historical characters of the Three Kingdoms era. The game's main objective is to become the supreme ruler of the remnants of the falling Han Dynasty. To do this the player has to build a mighty empire by conquering provinces and recruiting generals worthy of command. Fight massive battles, triumph over natural disasters and capture enemy strongholds.
DESC_ZH:
《三国志》，又名《三国演义》，是一款基于罗贯中同名历史小说改编的电子游戏。该游戏由光荣公司于1999年为万代掌机WonderSwan开发并发行。
玩家将扮演众多在黄巾起义后争夺统治权的军阀之一。
这款回合制策略游戏引入了数百位三国时期的历史人物。游戏的主要目标是成为摇摇欲坠的汉朝残余势力的最高统治者。为此，玩家必须通过征服各个省份并招募值得指挥的将领来建立一个强大的帝国。参与大规模战斗，战胜自然灾害，攻占敌方据点。

NAME: Sangokushi 2 For Wonderswan
NAME_ZH: 三国志2 幻想天鹅版
DESC:
Sangokushi II, or Romance of the Three Kingdoms II, is a video game based on the historical novel of the same name by Luo Guanzhong. It was developed and published by Koei in 2000 for the WonderSwan and is the sequel to the first game released in 1999. 
Upon starting the game, players choose from one of six scenarios that determine the initial layout of power in ancient China. The scenarios loosely depict allegiances and territories controlled by the warlords as according to the novel, although gameplay does not follow events in the novel after the game begins. The player wins the game by conquering all territories in China. This is accomplished by being in control of every province on the map.
DESC_ZH:
《三国志II》，即《三国演义II》，是一款基于罗贯中同名历史小说改编的电子游戏。该游戏由光荣公司于2000年为幻想天鹅掌机开发并发行，是1999年发行的第一部游戏的续作。

游戏开始时，玩家可以从六个剧本中选择一个，这些剧本决定了古代中国的初始势力布局。这些剧本大致描绘了小说中各路军阀的联盟和控制的领土，不过游戏开始后，玩法并不遵循小说中的情节发展。玩家通过征服中国所有领土来赢得游戏，也就是控制地图上的每一个州郡。

NAME: Shanghai Pocket
NAME_ZH: 上海麻将口袋版
DESC:
This is a portable edition of the solitaire game Shanghai, the game uses traditional Mah Jong tiles. The aim of the game is to match tiles, four of each type will be put on the playing field, when two tiles are matched they are removed when none remain you win. Only tiles that can be moved freely to the left or right may be matched. A wrong move may result in you not being able to clear the field. 
A slight story mode is presented in the Shanghai mode; each tile setup is based on a Zodiac animal that needs it power restored. The goal is to complete all twelve of these stages there by restoring the animals power. 
Some variants are also included:
1. Kong Kong: Compete against a computer to clear tiles. If you go slowly you will have tiles sent over to your by your opponent. This type of play is similar to games like Puyo Pop. Kong Kong may be played against another player by using a link cable or against a computer.
2. Challenge (WonderSwan only): A large Shanghai game that you'll try to race through to get the best score. 
3. Goldrush: In this mode you will race against an opponent to reach a tile marked 'G'. G is for GOLD, boy! So get cracking.
DESC_ZH:
这是纸牌游戏《上海麻将》的便携版，游戏使用传统的麻将牌。游戏目标是匹配麻将牌，每种类型的牌会有四张放置在游戏场上，当两张牌匹配后，它们就会被移除，当所有牌都被移除时，你就获胜了。只有可以自由向左或向右移动的牌才能进行匹配。一次错误的移动可能会导致你无法清空牌场。
在上海模式中还有一个简单的故事模式；每个牌局的设置都基于一种生肖动物，需要恢复其力量。目标是完成所有十二个阶段，从而恢复这些动物的力量。
游戏还包含一些变体玩法：
1. 空空对战：与电脑竞争以清空牌。如果你行动缓慢，对手会向你发送牌。这种玩法类似于《噗哟噗哟》这类游戏。“空空对战”可以通过连接电缆与其他玩家对战，也可以与电脑对战。
2. 挑战模式（仅适用于万代WonderSwan掌机）：这是一个大型的上海麻将游戏，你需要尽快通关以获得最佳分数。 
3. 淘金模式：在这个模式中，你将与对手竞赛，率先到达标记为“G”的牌。嘿，“G”代表“黄金”，所以赶紧行动起来吧。

NAME: Soccer Yarou! ~challenge The World~
NAME_ZH: 足球去吧！~挑战世界~
DESC:
Like Coconuts Japan Entertainment Co., Ltd.'s other WonderSwan title Soccer Yarou! ~Challenge The World~ can largely be summed up by it's title; you will pick one of many global soccer teams and set off on a crusade against the rest.
The player controls a single one of their chosen team's members. The AI clumsily takes care of the rest. The player's selected splinter of the team avatar will move in the direction the player presses while dribbling the ball, should it be in his possession. When a button is pressed the ball will be kicked, should fortune spare your 2.49 inch screen a glance, to another player on your team. If another team member gets the ball you will automatically switch to that player. Kicking the ball is achieved by pressing a button which will more likely cause the player's character to fall on his face.
A penalty shot mini-game is included where the view shifts to behind the player making the shot.
DESC_ZH:
就像椰子日本娱乐有限公司的另一款万代神奇天鹅掌机游戏《足球去吧！~挑战世界~》的标题所概括的那样；你将从众多全球足球队中挑选一支，然后向其他球队发起挑战。
玩家控制所选球队中的一名队员。其余队员由笨拙的人工智能控制。如果球员拥有球权，在运球时，玩家所选的球队队员会朝着玩家按键的方向移动。当按下按钮时，如果运气好的话，球会被踢给你队中的另一名队员。如果另一名队员拿到球，你将自动切换到该队员。按下按钮来踢球，但更有可能的情况是，球员会脸朝下跌倒。
游戏中还包含一个点球小游戏，视角会切换到主罚球员的身后。

NAME_ZH: 毕业
DESC: Graduation is a Japanese anime "life-sim" game which are popular in Japan. Except for Princessmaker 2, which was never officially released, this is the only game of its type that I know of which was ever translated to English. In Graduation you take the r
DESC_ZH: 《毕业》是一款在日本很受欢迎的日式动漫风格“生活模拟”游戏。除了从未正式发行的《美少女梦工厂2》外，这是我所知唯一一款被翻译成英文的此类游戏。在《毕业》中，你将扮演……

NAME: Space Invaders
NAME_ZH: 太空侵略者
DESC:
A conversion of the classic arcade title, Space Invaders. This version, as part of the Arcade Classic series on Game Boy, has both 1 and 2 player modes using the usual 2 color Game Boy tones (black, grey) to re-create the addictive shooter. However, plug the cart into a Super Game Boy (an accessory of the Super Nintendo) and you have the option of playing the game in full color, with the original arcade cabinet as border art to the action while you play.
The game is very simple to play. Shoot down the incoming invaders while dodging their fire. They will advance slowly at first towards you, but the closer they come, the faster they get.
DESC_ZH:
这是经典街机游戏《太空侵略者》的移植版。作为Game Boy上“经典街机系列”的一部分，这个版本有单人模式和双人模式，采用Game Boy常见的两种色调（黑色、灰色）重现了这款令人上瘾的射击游戏。不过，将卡带插入超级Game Boy（超级任天堂的配件），你就可以选择以全彩模式玩游戏，在游戏过程中，屏幕边缘会显示原版街机机柜的图案。
这款游戏玩法非常简单。一边躲避敌人的火力，一边击落来袭的侵略者。一开始，它们会慢慢向你逼近，但离你越近，它们的移动速度就越快。

NAME: Super Robot Taisen Compact
NAME_ZH: 超级机器人大战紧凑版
DESC: The very first installment of the Super Robot Taisen series is quite different from all of its successors; most notably, the robots are treated as sentient organisms, and all pilots are absent from the game. As the intro tells, they live on the planet of
DESC_ZH: 超级机器人大战系列的第一部作品与它的所有后续作品大不相同；最显著的是，机器人被视为有感知能力的生物，而且游戏中没有任何机师。正如开场介绍所说，它们生活在这个星球上

FILE: Shin Nihon Pro Wrestling - Toukon Retsuden (Japan) (Rev 1).zip
NAME: Shin Nihon Pro Wrestling Toukon Retsuden
NAME_ZH: 新日本职业摔跤斗魂列传
DESC:
Straight from the National Japan Pro-Wrestling (NJPW) come the greatest wrestlers of the Land of the Rising Sun; beware the Thunder Lyger!
Shin Nihon Pro Wrestling Toukon Retsuden is a simple wrestling game where the player takes control of one of six wrestlers, who were current figures at the time of the games publication. Random battles can be arranged or competition in a tournament against all the games wrestlers.
A player controls their wrestler with the directional X buttons and the A & B buttons. A & B perform punches and kicks, in close enough a punch can perform a grab. Once a wrestler is locked in a grab they can be tossed according to the directional buttons. The more abuse a character take the longer it will take them to stand up, this makes them very agreeable to kick or jump upon. 
By punching a fallen gladiator you will get him in a lock. When done closer to the injured legs you will usually try to bend them and when done closer to his head you will crush his cranium between your mighty thighs. If you can do this for ten seconds without him breaking free, your chosen wrestler will win.
DESC_ZH:
来自全日本职业摔跤联盟（NJPW）的日本顶尖摔跤手们闪亮登场，小心“雷电莱格”！
《新日本职业摔跤斗魂列传》是一款简单的摔跤游戏，玩家可以操控六位摔跤手之一，这些选手在游戏发行时都是当红人物。玩家可以安排随机对战，也能参加锦标赛，与游戏中的所有摔跤手一决高下。
玩家通过方向键和 A、B 键来操控摔跤手。A 键和 B 键用于出拳和踢腿，距离够近时，出拳还能抓住对手。一旦抓住对手，就可以根据方向键将其扔出去。选手受到的攻击越多，起身所需的时间就越长，此时就很容易被踢或被跳压。
攻击倒地的对手可以将其锁住。如果在靠近对手腿部的位置发动攻击，通常会尝试掰折其腿部；若在靠近头部的位置发动攻击，则会用大腿夹住其头部。若能在十秒内不让对手挣脱，你所选的摔跤手就会获胜。

NAME: Shougi Touryuumon
NAME_ZH: 将棋touryuumon
DESC: A basic shogi (Japanese chess) game that can be used as an introduction to shogi. The game has a variety of game modes, such as authentic 'Honshogi', 'Winner-take-all' for testing your skills, and 'Tsutsumi-Shogi', which can be played in a short intervals. The 'Research Mode' allows players to select from various patterns of fighting from the beginning, such as 'stick Gin' and '4-segment skipping car', making this game ideal for beginners to improve their skills. Also, considering the fact that the game is designed for a portable console, it is possible to save a game record for each move, so that you can stop the game at any time.
DESC_ZH: 一款基础的将棋（日本象棋）游戏，可作为将棋入门教程。该游戏有多种游戏模式，如正宗的“本将棋”、考验技巧的“一决胜负”模式，以及可在短时间内完成的“包将棋”。“研究模式”允许玩家从一开始就选择各种战斗模式，如“棒银”和“四格飞车”，非常适合初学者提升技能。此外，考虑到该游戏是为便携游戏机设计的，它可以保存每一步的游戏记录，让你随时暂停游戏。

NAME: Side Pocket
NAME_ZH: 边袋台球
DESC:
The main objective is to cross different USA cities and reach the predetermined scores to go ahead. But remember: you'll have only 16 balls and every error can be lethal!
The game also comes with modes for 2 players with two variants: 2P Pocket Game (the traditional mode) and 2P 9-Ball Game, where the premise is to sink 9 balls before the other player makes them first. If you prefer, test your target in Trick Game or even hear your favorite song in Jukebox.
After each stage completed (and some luck), a bonus stage will appear, as well as the chance to earn extra balls. You will only need a good target in the parquet block!
DESC_ZH:
主要目标是穿越美国不同的城市，并达到预定分数以继续前进。但请记住：你只有16个球，每一个失误都可能是致命的！
游戏还提供两种双人模式：双人口袋游戏（传统模式）和双人9球游戏，该模式的前提是在其他玩家之前打进9个球。如果你愿意，还可以在技巧游戏中测试你的瞄准能力，甚至可以在点唱机里播放你最喜欢的歌曲。
每完成一个阶段（再加上一些运气），就会出现一个奖励关卡，还有机会获得额外的球。你只需要在拼花地板上有出色的瞄准能力就行！

NAME: Slither Link
NAME_ZH: 数回
DESC:
Slither Link is a fiendishly simple puzzle game from the pages of the Nikoli puzzle magazine. While Nikoli is widely known for coining the puzzle name Sudoku they also have produced a myriad of puzzles often dealing with numbers. 
In this puzzle the player needs to create a loop around the fields grid with out having the loop's line cross itself. This would of course present little challenge if it weren't for those pesky numbers. The field is dotted with numerals that signal how many times the line may be next to it. The number one may only have the line contiguous with it on one side, the two two sides, the three three side. Four of course does not exist as that would, by a requirement to have four sides, create a square and thus a intersection of the line. Zeros also exist these may not have any lines bordering them at all. 
When a loop has been created so that all numbers are 'touched' appropriately and the line make a full loop you've cleared the puzzle. The game possesses six levels of difficulty and is played vertically on the WonderSwan.
DESC_ZH:
数回是一款源自《Nikoli》谜题杂志的极其简单的解谜游戏。虽然Nikoli因创造了“数独”这一谜题名称而广为人知，但他们也推出了大量常与数字相关的谜题。
在这个谜题中，玩家需要在方格周围绘制一条不交叉的回路。当然，如果没有那些讨厌的数字，这几乎没有什么挑战。方格中散布着数字，这些数字表示回路与该方格相邻的边数。数字“1”表示回路只能与该方格的一条边相邻，数字“2”表示两条边，数字“3”表示三条边。数字“4”当然不存在，因为按照要求有四条边会形成一个正方形，从而导致回路交叉。数字“0”表示该方格周围不能有任何回路经过。
当绘制出的回路满足所有数字的要求且形成一个完整的回路时，你就解开了这个谜题。该游戏有六个难度级别，在万代WonderSwan掌机上以竖屏方式进行游戏。

NAME_ZH: 超级机器人大战 Compact 2 - 第二部 - 宇宙激震篇
DESC: Super Robot Taisen Compact 2 was the second Super Robot Taisen strategy RPG to be released on the WonderSwan. Like Super Robot Taisen F/ F Final before it, Compact 2 is split into multiple parts: Part 1 and Part 2 occur simultaneously, while Part 3 continues from Part 2. Using the WonderSwan's internal memory, players can send their clear data to each successive game; several events are altered based on the player's previous save, gained items are carried over to Part 3, and a special final scenario can be unlocked by clearing the entire trilogy within 777 turns. The game, like its predecessor, borrows almost all of its gameplay mechanics from F/F Final; however, it introduces the "Support System" which immediately became a core mechanic of the SRW franchise. In Part 2, Excellen Browning and the Londo Bell forces fend off enemies in outer space.
DESC_ZH: 《超级机器人大战 Compact 2》是在万代 WonderSwan 掌机上推出的第二款《超级机器人大战》策略角色扮演游戏。和之前的《超级机器人大战 F/F 完结篇》一样，《Compact 2》分为多个篇章：第一章和第二章同时进行，第三章则承接第二章。借助 WonderSwan 的内置内存，玩家可以将通关数据传输到后续的游戏中；根据玩家之前的存档，一些事件会发生改变，获得的物品会延续到第三章，并且在 777 回合内通关整个三部曲还能解锁一个特殊的最终剧情。和前作一样，这款游戏几乎借鉴了《F/F 完结篇》的所有游戏机制；不过，它引入了“支援系统”，该系统很快成为了《超级机器人大战》系列的核心机制。在第二章中，艾克塞琳·布朗宁和隆德·贝尔部队在外太空抵御敌人。

NAME: Tare Panda no GunPey
NAME_ZH: 垂耳熊猫的方块射击
DESC:
Tarepanda no Gunpey is a Gunpey style puzzler which has the modes of Gunpey EX with an additional Tarepanda story mode. 
The game includes classic Gunpey, endless Gunpey, a timed line removal mode, and a mode where the player must clear all lines at once. Two players can also link up to challenge each other and exchange high-scores. 
A story mode is also included. Tarepanda discovers the existence of other lazy pandas all around the world; wondering what other floppy pandas are like Tare rolls off in search of them.
Each panda wears headgear associated with its homeland, top hat for Britain, turban for India, etc. When our hero is about to reach the new lazy panda something gets in the way, usually an incline too large to roll over. By finishing a certain number of lines you'll give your stymied panda the energy to jump the obstacle. 
In the story mode a number of novel hazards are presented. Your lines may flip angles, or parts of the screen may be entirely blocked out.
DESC_ZH:
《垂耳熊猫的方块射击》是一款方块射击风格的益智游戏，它拥有方块射击EX模式，还有额外的垂耳熊猫故事模式。
该游戏包含经典方块射击、无尽方块射击、限时消行模式，以及玩家必须一次性清除所有行的模式。两名玩家还可以联机对战并交换高分。
游戏还包含一个故事模式。垂耳熊猫发现世界各地还有其他懒熊猫；它好奇其他慵懒的熊猫是什么样的，于是滚着去寻找它们。
每只熊猫都戴着与其家乡相关的头饰，比如英国的礼帽、印度的头巾等等。当我们的主角即将找到新的懒熊猫时，总会有阻碍出现，通常是一个太大而无法滚过去的斜坡。通过完成一定数量的消行，你就能让被困的熊猫获得跳过障碍的能量。
在故事模式中，会出现许多新奇的障碍。你的方块行可能会改变角度，或者屏幕的部分区域可能会被完全挡住。

NAME: Tekken Card Challenge
NAME_ZH: 铁拳卡片挑战
DESC:
Tekken Card Challenge is a turn-based fighting game featuring the characters from Tekken 3 plus an exclusive character named Crow. 
It utilizes a system similar to Nintendo's Pokémon games. Two opponents are to fight at a time, with various cards for different maneuvers and a 100 point HP total for damage accumulation. The player begins with a hand of four cards, drawing more as the duel proceeds. 
The battle system is similar to Yu-Gi-Oh! in that the three types of cards perform in a rock, paper, and scissors pattern. Attack cards are played against each other to compare values with the loser being discarded and deducting HP, an attack card played against a defense nullifies each other, and two block cards cancel each other out. There is also a minor system of air juggling, which can be quite damaging given the correct order of cards.
DESC_ZH:
《铁拳卡片挑战》是一款回合制格斗游戏，游戏角色来自《铁拳 3》，此外还有一位名为克劳的专属角色。
它采用了类似于任天堂《宝可梦》系列游戏的系统。每次由两名对手进行对战，玩家可使用各种卡片来施展不同的招式，生命值总计 100 点，用于累积伤害。玩家初始手牌有四张卡片，随着对战进行可抽取更多卡片。
战斗系统类似于《游戏王》，三种类型的卡片遵循石头、剪刀、布的规则。攻击卡相互对抗时，比较数值大小，数值小的卡片被弃掉，同时扣除相应生命值；攻击卡与防御卡对抗时，两者相互抵消；两张格挡卡对抗时，也会相互抵消。此外，还有一个小型的空中连击系统，如果卡片使用顺序正确，会造成相当可观的伤害。

NAME: Umizuri ni Ikou!
NAME_ZH: 去海钓吧！
DESC:
Umitsuri ni Ikou! is a simple fishing simulator where you control a little boy at a variety of seaside locations; a pier, a beach, a stone outcropping, and out on the ocean.
As you cast a bar will rise and fall on the right side of the screen, when you press the A button the the bar will stop. Depending on how high the bar is when you stop it correlates to how far your line goes. Bigger fish lurk farther out; however, bigger fish are more difficult to real in given their distance from shore.
One your hook is in the water you will be treated to a [fisheye?] view of it in the brine. The background water is represented in different gradients so that the player can tell if they are moving up and down. A meter on the right hand side of the screen shows how deep you are, the farther you cast the deeper you'll be. 
By pulling the line up with fish will be attracted to the hook. Should one grab on you'll get a "HIT". The view will now revert to being behind the fisher. Based on indications from a bar on the bottom you will have to push left and right, based on how the fish is trying to escape while pressing A. 
Once caught you'll learn how big your fish was and be able to exchange data about it with other WonderSwan players.
DESC_ZH:
《去海钓吧！》是一款简单的钓鱼模拟游戏，你将操控一个小男孩，在各种海边地点进行钓鱼，包括码头、海滩、礁石和海上。
当你抛竿时，屏幕右侧会有一个进度条上下移动，按下 A 键进度条会停止。进度条停止时的高度决定了你的鱼线抛出的距离。越远的地方藏着越大的鱼；然而，由于离岸边较远，钓到更大的鱼也更困难。
鱼钩入水后，你将看到它在海水中的[鱼眼视角？]画面。背景海水用不同的渐变表示，这样玩家可以判断鱼钩是在上升还是下降。屏幕右侧的仪表显示你所在的深度，抛得越远，深度越深。
收线时会吸引鱼咬钩。如果有鱼咬钩，你会看到“上钩了”提示。视角会切换到钓鱼者身后。根据底部进度条的指示，你需要根据鱼逃跑的方向左右推动，并按下 A 键。
钓到鱼后，你会知道鱼的大小，还能与其他万代神奇天鹅掌机玩家交换有关这条鱼的数据。

NAME: Uzumaki : Denshi Kaikihen
NAME_ZH: 漩涡：电子怪奇篇
DESC: This interactive manga tells the tale of the town of a small Japanese town, Kurôzu-Cho, trapped in a vast spiraling curse. The story is told from the perspective of a woman, Kirie Goshima, who lived Kurôzu-Cho and now looks back to certain events that took place during here high school years.
DESC_ZH: 这部互动漫画讲述了日本一个小镇——黑涡镇，陷入巨大螺旋诅咒的故事。故事以一位名叫五岛桐绘的女性视角展开，她曾居住在黑涡镇，如今回首高中时期发生的某些事件。

NAME: Uzumaki : Noroi Simulation
NAME_ZH: 漩涡：诅咒模拟
DESC:
In this game you take play as the "Spiral Curse" of Uzumaki trying to bring curling madness to all of Kurôzu-Cho! Kirie Goshima returns but no longer as a beloved protagonist. Now she is a target, one of many, that you will try to infect with the spiral curse. In this oddly comic twist on the old horror story, not to say that this game is devoid of similar horrific elements of its predecessor.
After a brief explanation of your role as the Spiral Curse, given by Uzumaki Sen'nin (The Spiral Master) you begin your task. Generally you make life worse as merry mischief making curse.
You will be presented with a map of Kurôzu-Cho; from which you can select where to travel. At each locations you will meet different people and be able to collect unique items. Items can be used to make the influence of the Spiral grow in certain areas, along with interacting with various people. 
As you cause more mayhem more areas being to open, which allow you torment the old heroes even more!
A small human/slug monster hybrid virtual pet can be accessed from the main menu.
DESC_ZH:
在这款游戏中，你将扮演《漩涡》中的“螺旋诅咒”，试图将卷曲的疯狂带到整个黑涡镇！五岛桐绘回归了，但不再是受人喜爱的主角。现在她成了目标之一，你要尝试用螺旋诅咒感染包括她在内的许多人。在这个对经典恐怖故事进行的奇特喜剧化改编中，并不是说这款游戏没有其前作中类似的恐怖元素。
在“漩涡仙人”对你作为螺旋诅咒的角色进行简要说明后，你就开始执行任务。总体而言，你要作为一个爱捣乱的诅咒让人们的生活变得更糟。
你会看到一张黑涡镇的地图，你可以从中选择前往的地点。在每个地点，你会遇到不同的人，并能够收集独特的物品。物品可以用来增强螺旋在某些区域的影响力，还能与不同的人进行互动。
随着你制造更多的混乱，更多区域将会开放，这让你能更肆意地折磨昔日的英雄们！
你可以从主菜单中访问一个小型人/蛞蝓怪物混合虚拟宠物。

NAME: Vaitz Blade
NAME_ZH: 维茨之刃
DESC: Vaitz Blade is an RPG set in a medieval European-style world, where you collect monsters by lowering their hitpoints. You can also fuse two monsters to create a stronger one. The game has 200 collectible species. The main point of this game is the "Vaitz" in the title. It is a generic term for monsters, and there are more than 180 different types of Vaitz in total in "Vaitz Blade". And it's not just monsters that can be combined with each other, but also items that can be combined with each other in this game. The variety of battles is one of the game's charms. In addition to the normal battles in which the player makes full use of the weapons and items he/she has created, the game also includes events and special battles in the arena (one-on-one combat, tag team matches, team battles, winner-take-all battles and time attacks) that add to the excitement of the game. There are also plenty of events during the story, such as a vertical shooting game that takes advantage of the unique characteristics of WonderSwan.
DESC_ZH: 《维茨之刃》是一款以中世纪欧洲风格世界为背景的角色扮演游戏，在这个世界里，你可以通过降低怪物的生命值来收集它们。你还能将两只怪物融合，创造出更强的怪物。游戏中有200种可收集的物种。这款游戏的核心在于标题中的“维茨”。它是怪物的统称，在《维茨之刃》中，总共有超过180种不同类型的维茨。而且，在这款游戏中，不仅怪物之间可以相互组合，物品之间也能相互组合。战斗的多样性是这款游戏的魅力之一。除了玩家充分利用自己制作的武器和物品进行的常规战斗外，游戏还包括竞技场中的活动和特殊战斗（一对一战斗、双打比赛、团队战斗、赢家通吃战斗和限时挑战），这些都增添了游戏的趣味性。在剧情中也有很多活动，比如利用万代WonderSwan掌机独特特性的纵向射击游戏。

DESC:
Street Dancer is a rhythm game starring the crew of wuz?b? a Japanese pop music performance group. 
The game features standard with a line of button prompts scrolling across the bottom of the play are that you will have to press when they reach the center of the screen. Before you start a game you will be asked to select a member of the wuz?b? crew; Nana, Kaoru, Shino, or U. As you press buttons the chosen terpsichorean will shake it or stare at you in stupefaction, depending on your performance. A 'life bar' is presented on the screen if you fail to perform well the bar will go down, when it is empty your game ends. To clear a stage and unlock a new background with a harder song you'll have to get about a 60% perfect score. You can always record your performances to watch over and over.
When a stage is clear you unlock new dance moves, these dance moves will appear in the game and in the "Step Book". In the step book you can watch the members of wuz?b? perform all their signature moves. You can also have the dancers perform in any way you like which you can record and repay for your friends. 
Three different musical styles are represented: jazz, hip hop, and rock. The game makes each of these modes unique, not just by changing musical tone but, by having the player change the way he holds the WonderSwan for each genre.
The forms are:
1. Hip hop: the screen is held in the normal horizontal position so that the left hand can hit the A+B buttons and right hand can press the basic directional keys.
2. Lockin' [sic]: In the mode the system is held so that both hands can press the directional buttons.This mode also requires you to press two notes at a time usually matching directions on both sets of directional buttons.
3. Jazz: This is a total reversal of the hip hop mode. The system will now be horizontal but essentially upside down. Now the directional keys and A+B buttons will be at the top of the console
A multiplayer mode is also included for two people on one system. both players take one set of the WonderSwans directional buttons and both players select different dancers. The multiplayer mode takes place in the vertical "lockin'" style, with two columns of press commands scrolling on the right. Both players are instructed by one of the columns, the player that is doing better will have their chosen dancer displayed on the screen.
DESC_ZH:
《街头舞者》是一款节奏游戏，主角是日本流行音乐表演团体 wuz?b? 的成员。
该游戏的标准玩法是，在游戏界面底部会有一排按键提示滚动，当提示到达屏幕中央时，你必须按下相应按键。游戏开始前，你需要从 wuz?b? 团队成员中选择一位：娜娜、薰、志乃或 U。当你按下按键时，所选的舞者会随着你的表现或舞动身姿，或一脸茫然地盯着你。屏幕上会显示一个“生命条”，如果你表现不佳，生命条就会下降，当生命条为空时，游戏结束。要通关一个关卡并解锁新的背景和难度更高的歌曲，你需要获得约 60% 的完美得分。你可以随时录制自己的表演，反复观看。
通关一个关卡后，你将解锁新的舞蹈动作，这些舞蹈动作会出现在游戏和“舞步手册”中。在舞步手册里，你可以观看 wuz?b? 成员表演他们所有的招牌动作。你还可以让舞者按照你喜欢的方式表演，并将其录制下来给朋友看。
游戏包含三种不同的音乐风格：爵士、嘻哈和摇滚。游戏不仅通过改变音乐风格，还通过让玩家针对不同音乐类型改变握持万代 WonderSwan 掌机的方式，使每种模式都独具特色。
具体形式如下：
1. 嘻哈：屏幕保持正常的横向握持，这样左手可以按下 A + B 键，右手可以按下基本方向键。
2. 锁舞：在这种模式下，掌机的握持方式要让双手都能按下方向键。这种模式还要求你同时按下两个音符，通常需要同时匹配两组方向键的方向。
3. 爵士：这与嘻哈模式完全相反。此时掌机仍是横向握持，但实际上是上下颠倒的。现在方向键和 A + B 键位于掌机顶部。
游戏还支持一台掌机两人游玩的多人模式。两名玩家各使用一组 WonderSwan 的方向键，并且各自选择不同的舞者。多人模式采用纵向的“锁舞”风格，右侧会有两列按键指令滚动。两名玩家根据其中一列指令操作，表现更好的玩家所选的舞者将显示在屏幕上。

NAME: Wonder Stadium
NAME_ZH: 梦幻体育场
DESC:
Wonder Stadium, not to be confused with the near identical Wonder Stadium '99, presents a monochrome baseball experience for the WonderSwan. Players will quickly be able to start playing as one of fourteen teams, twelve professional two fictional, in All-Star Duel, Exhibition Game, or Homerun Competition modes. Player can also personalize their teams by giving the generic characters who comprise the teams names. 
When starting a game you'll be asked to select a team, a stadium; classic, seaside, or space, and how many innings the game will run from 1 to 9.
Hitting the ball is the 'simple' affair that it usually is, time your swing and if you timed well your ball will fly into or out of the field. Wonder Stadium does give the ability to bunt and tweak the direction that bunt will go. 
While playing the field you'll have considerable command over a number of different pitches. From moving your pitchers subtly around the mound to how hard a throw you'll give. Once your opposing team manages to get a hit the game stops giving you the view from behind the plate a switches to a birds-eye view of the field.
Each ballplayer is hooked to another for instance when you move your man on first base the fellow in the field behind him will move in the same way, a bit clumsy but an acceptable compromise. The person nearest the ball will always be under your control. Once you get the ball you may throw it toward a base of your choice.
DESC_ZH:
《梦幻体育场》，不要与几乎一模一样的《梦幻体育场99》混淆，它为万代WonderSwan掌机带来了一场黑白风格的棒球游戏体验。玩家可以迅速选择十四支球队之一开始游戏，其中十二支为职业球队，两支为虚构球队，可参与全明星对决、表演赛或本垒打大赛模式。玩家还可以为组成球队的普通角色命名，从而个性化自己的球队。

开始游戏时，你需要选择一支球队、一个体育场（经典、海滨或太空风格），以及比赛的局数（1到9局）。

击球和往常一样是个“简单”的操作，把握好挥棒时机，如果时机把握得当，球就会飞入或飞出球场。《梦幻体育场》还允许玩家进行短打，并调整短打的方向。

在防守时，你可以对多种不同的投球方式进行相当程度的控制。从让投手在投手丘周围进行细微移动，到控制投球的力度。一旦对方球队击出球，游戏视角就会从本垒后方切换为球场的鸟瞰视角。

每个球员之间相互关联，例如，当你移动一垒上的球员时，他身后外场的球员也会以同样的方式移动，虽然有点笨拙，但这是可以接受的折中方案。离球最近的球员始终由你控制。一旦你拿到球，就可以将球投向你选择的垒位。

NAME: Wonder Stadium '99
NAME_ZH: 梦幻体育场99
DESC:
Wonder Stadium '99 was released a mere five months after the original Wonder Stadium and does not add much in the way of gameplay. This update adds information about the 1999 Japanese baseball season to the game. Such as Seibu's Matsuzaka and Uehara of the Yomiuri Giants.
The game gives you a selection of 14 fictional and professional teams as well as three different stadiums, just as the original did.
DESC_ZH:
《梦幻体育场99》在初代《梦幻体育场》发售仅五个月后便推出，在游戏玩法方面并没有太多新增内容。此次更新为游戏加入了1999年日本棒球赛季的相关信息，比如西武队的松坂大辅和读卖巨人队的上原浩治。
和初代一样，这款游戏为你提供了14支虚构球队和职业球队供你选择，还有三个不同的体育场。
